Sra. Cielo says that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer. She joined after receiving an invitation from a friend. Cielo currently manages a business selling coffee from a kiosk.

The loan she is now receiving will be used to increase her capital for buying bread, meat, and other supplies so that she can start a new service of selling hamburgers. Working in this manner enables her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. Cielo is single and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Cielo said that she enjoys the health services.

loans.use: to buy bread, meat, and other supplies for selling hamburgers.

loans.name: Edzodzinam

texts.fr:
Edzodzinam est un homme âgé de 27 ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charge.
Edzodzinam travaille comme revendeur de produits EDMARK (produits pour la santé) depuis 2010. Il sert ses clients dans un quartier de la place et achète les produits à LOME et à ACCRA. 
Edzodzinam a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des produits EDMARK.
texts.en:
Edzodzinam is a 27 year-old man. He is single and does not have children in his care.
Edzodzinam has been working as a retailer for EDMARK products (health products) since 2010. He assists his customers in a local district and purchases his products in Lome and Accra.
Edzodzinam has requested his first loan cycle from WAGES in order to purchase EDMARK products.

loans.use: to buy EDMARK products.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: El señor Manuel es abogado y trabaja en las oficinas legales de la Lotería Nacional y su esposa es comerciante. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de una maestría  en Leyes en la universidad Mayor de San Andrés. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Ciudad de Satélite en la ciudad de El Alto;  es casado   y tiene dos  hijos. Con el crédito que anteriormente se le concedió, también a través de Kiva, pudo hacer el pago inicial de la Maestría que está estudiando; por esta razón está muy agradecido con los financiadotes de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Manuel is an attorney and works at the legal offices of the National Lottery.  His wife is a merchant.  Manuel is requesting this loan so that he can pay for a Masters in Law degree from the Greater University of San Andrés.  He lives in his own home in the District of Ciudad de Satélite in the city of El Alto.  Manuel is married and has two children.  
	
With his previous loan, which was also funded through Kiva, he was able to make the initial payment toward his Masters degree.  For this reason, Manuel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay the second installment toward his Masters degree.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Alberto es soltero, no tiene hijos, su principal negocio es brindar el servicio de transporte urbano por más de 4 años en toda la ciudad de Ica, el Sr. Juan es muy responsable, trabaja todos los días en su movilidad con lo que ha podido comprar un terreno donde va a construir su casa; sus ingresos son de S/ 300 nuevos soles semanales. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de electrodomésticos para iniciar otro negocio. Su principal desafío es el frio que tiene que soportar todas las noches cuando trabaja en la madrugada haciendo taxi; su sueño es poder construir su casa propia y casarse.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto is single and has no children. His main business has been to provide urban transportation services for more than 4 years throughout the whole city of Ica. Juan is very responsible and uses his vehicle for business purposes every day. With the proceeds, he has been able to buy a piece of land where he will build his house. His income is 300 PEN on a weekly basis. 

He will use the loan to invest in the purchase of electronics to start another business. His main challenge is the cold he has to endure every night when he works in the early mornings as a taxi driver. His dream is to be able to build his own house and get married.

loans.use: to buy electronics to start another business.

loans.name: Koffi Ahlin

texts.fr:
Koffi Ahlin est un homme âgé de 67ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il n’a  pas d’enfants.
Koffi Ahlin travaille comme revendeur d’accessoires de communication depuis 2010. Il vend à ses clients à Kodjoviakopé. Il achète les produits à MEDIA PLUS. 
Koffi Ahlin a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des accessoires de communications.
texts.en:
Koffi Ahlin is a 67 year-old man. He is married to a retailer. He does not have children.
Koffi Ahlin has been working as a retailer of communication accessories since 2010. He sells to his customers in Kodjoviakopé. He purchases his products from Media Plus.
Koffi Ahlin has requested his first loan cycle from WAGES in order to purchase communication accessories.

loans.use: to buy communication accessories.

loans.name: Patricia Del Pilar

texts.es:
Patricia tiene 34 años vive en Pujilí cerca de latacunga, vive con sus hijos y con su familia; sus hijos tienen 8 y 10 años de edad. Patricia se describe como una persona alegre y con mucha responsabilidad.

Trabaja en la crianza de cerdos y en la cocecha de chochos junto con su familia. Es la primera vez que trabaja con Fodemi, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de cerdos con esta compra podrá incrementar su negocio.

Su sueño es tener mas cerdos para incrementar considerablemente su negocio y así poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Patricia is 34 years old and lives in Pujilí, which is near Latacunga. She lives with her children and her family. Her children are ages 8 and 10. Patricia describes herself as a cheerful person with many responsibilities.

She raises pigs and harvests lupin beans with her family. This is the first time she has worked with FODEMI. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy pigs so that she can increase her business.

Her dream is to have more pigs so that she can considerably increase her business, as well as improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Jose Alfonso

texts.es:
Jose Alfonso tiene 42 años de edad  es casado vive con su esposa y con sus tres hijos de catorce, doce y diez años en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNIONse encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

Jose Alfonso se dedica al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café, etc. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas,  para sus cultivos. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño de aquí a cinco años es poderse comprar una casa para poderle dejar a su hijo.

Le gusta escuchar música, salir y compartir momentos amenos junto a su hijo y  amigos.
texts.en:
Jose Alfonso is 42 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children (ages 14, 12, and 11) in the canton of Chillanes in Bolívar Province.

The Communal Bank “Nuevos Unidos” is located in the parish of San José del Tambo, which is part of the canton of Chillanes. The members of this Communal Bank are farmers who grow mainly corn, cacao, oranges, bananas, and coffee.

Jose Alfonso grows corn, cacao, oranges, bananas, coffee, and other crops. He buys his supplies and sells his products at the market in San José del Tambo each weekend.

Jose Alfonso is requesting a loan to buy supplies, fertilizers, and agricultural composts for his crops. This loan provides the support to meet his financial needs and improve his farming activities. The challenges he faces include the falling prices of the products he sells to people, such as middlemen. His dream five years from now is to buy a house so that he can leave it to his son.

Jose Alfonso enjoys listening to music and going out and sharing pleasant moments with his son and with friends.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers, and compost for his crops.

loans.name: Maura Isabel

texts.es: Maura Isabel, madre soltera, D. treinta y cuatro años D. edad vive con sus cuatro hijos en casa propia. Ella venD. ropa D. forma ambulante en diferentes zonas y cercanas con relatividad a la ciudad donD. resiD., y las cuales son mercados locales, parques, colonias populosas, calles principales, incluso el transporte colectivo, dado que es donD. hay concentraciones D. personas y clientes efectivos segun cuenta ella. Con esta estrategía agregada la buena actitud D. la que cuenta para los negocios se ha hecho D. muchos clientes, ademas que la ropa que venD. es D. muy buena calidad, con diferentes estilos, novedosos y a precios realmente accesibles; Maura Isabel es una mujer emprendedora se levanta desD. muy temprano a vender a las calles para lograr vender todos su producto, debido a la fuerte demanda necesita más mercancía y es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y así satisfacer la necesidad D. su clientela. Maura Isabel tiene confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Maura Isabel is a thirty four year old single mother of four who lives in her own home. She sells clothes as as street vendor in and around the city where she lives. She sells in local markets, parks, populated neighborhoods, main streets, and even on public transportation, since that is where people and good customers gather according to her. With this strategy and her good attituD. towards business, she had gained a lot of customers. In addition, the clothes she sells is of a very good quality with different and new styles at accessible prices. Maura Isabel is an enterprising woman who gets up early every day to go out on the streets and sell all of her product. Due to strong demand, she needs more merchandise and that is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy clothing wholesale and thus meet her customers' needs. Maura Isabel is confident that in this way she will be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Sumac Maki Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SUMAC MAKI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Katia Marilyn; ella es soltera y tiene 32 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. venta D. artesanía, ella hace trabajos D. lana como chalinas, chompas y polos, ella venD. en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor y también para comprar lana para tejer las chompas y chalinas.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio D. venta D. artesanía, negocio D. taller D. mecánica, negocio D. venta D. frutas, negocio D. venta D. maquinaria, negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the group called “Sumac Maki” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

Sra. Katia Marilyn is 32 years old, single, and has two children. She works in her own crafts business where she makes articles out of wool such as scarves, sweaters, and shirts. Katia sells her goods as a street vendor and works between the hours of 8am and 7pm. Through her business, she has been able to help her children move forward. Katia wants to expand her business of selling crafts, so she is requesting a loan to buy handicrafts in bulk. She will also buy wool for knitting sweaters and scarves.

The other members engage in businesses such as selling handicrafts, operating an auto repair shop, selling fruit, selling machinery, and selling groceries.

Katia is grateful for being part of her group and for being able to fulfill her dream in this manner. She promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts in bulk to sell and wool for knitting sweaters and scarves.

loans.name: José Rodrigo

texts.es:
José Rodrigo  tiene 54 años de edad  es casado vive con su esposa y con sus tres hijos de 10, 8 y 3 años en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNION se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

José Rodrigo se dedica al cultivo de cacao y naranja. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas,  para sus cultivos y mejorar las huertas de cacao. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es seguir trabajando y poder dar la educación a los hijos.

Le gusta salir de paseo con la familia.
texts.en:
José Rodrigo, 54, is married living with his wife and three children who are 10, 8 and 3 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Union” (New Unity) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

José Rodrigo farms cocoa beans and oranges.  His purchases and the sale of his products take place at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

He is requesting the loan to buy farming supplies, manure and fertilizer for his crops and to improve his cocoa bean crops.  The loan will help him meet his economic needs and improve his farming activities.  He faces challenges like the drop in prices of the products he sells as well as dealing with middlemen.  His dream is to stay in business and be able to provide his children with an education.  He enjoys going on family outings.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Adjo Georgette

texts.fr:
Adjo Georgette est une femme âgée de 32 ans. Elle est mariée å un pasteur. Elle n’a pas d’enfants 
Adjo Georgette travaille comme couturière et revendeuse de pagnes il y a 2ans. Elle vend à ses clients de façon ambulante et achète les produits au Grand Marché de Lomé. 
Adjo Georgette a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes.
texts.en: Adjo Georgette is a 32 year-old woman. She is married to a clergyman. She does not have children. Adjo Georgette started working as a seamstress and retailer of pagnes (local fabric) 2 years ago. She sells to her customers door-to-door and purchases her products from the Grand Market in Lome. Adjo Georgette has requested her first loan cycle from WAGES in order to purchase pagnes.

loans.use: to buy 'pagnes' (local fabric).

loans.name: Mayra Jannet

La V.R.C NUEVA UNION se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

Mayra Jannet se dedica al cultivo de cacao y naranja. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

Mayra Jannet, 31, is single living with her two children who are 12 and 10 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Mayra Jannet grows cocoa beans and oranges.  She makes her purchases and her sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

She requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizers and manure, for her crops.  The loan will help her meet her economic needs and improve her farming activities.  She faces challenges like the drop in price of the products she sells as well as dealing with middlemen.  Her dream is to have a house of her own.  She enjoys going on outings with her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

 Gladys Azucena se dedica al cultivo de cacao, maíz, arroz y naranja. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

Le gusta  en los momentos libres conversar con los hijos y ayudar hacer las tareas de la escuela.
texts.en:
Gladys Azucena, 37, is single living with her two children who are 14 and 10 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Gladys Azucena grows cocoa beans, corn, rice and oranges.  She makes her purchases and her sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

She requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizers and manure, for her crops.  The loan will help her meet her economic needs and improve her farming activities.  She faces challenges like the drop in price of the products she sells as well as dealing with middlemen.  

Her dream is to buy land to continue farming and provide her children with the best education so that they will have a good future.  In her free time she enjoys chatting with her children and helping them do their homework.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Edisa Mariana

texts.es:
Edisa Mariana  tiene 50 años de edad  es soltera vive con una hija de 16 años en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNIONse encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

 Edisa Mariana se dedica al cultivo de cacao, maíz y arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos para luego vender. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas y alimento para los pollos. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta  salir de paseo con la hija y conversar con los vecinos.
texts.en:
Edisa Mariana, 50, is single living with her 16-year-old daughter in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Edisa Mariana grows cocoa beans, corn and rice.  She also raises chickens to sell later.  She makes her purchases and her sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

She requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizers and manure, for her crops and chicken feed.  The loan will help her meet her economic needs and improve her farming activities.  She faces challenges like the drop in price of the products she sells as well as dealing with middlemen.  

Her dream is to have a house of her own and she enjoys going on outings with her daughter and chatting with her neighbors.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and chicken feed.

loans.name: Yemalin De Yevie Group

texts.fr: Le groupement YEMALIN DE YEVIE  est composé de 16 membres qui vivent tous dans le même quartier. La présidente de ce groupement, du nom de Julienne, est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite pour une première fois l'appui financier de ALIDé. Julienne est âgée de 35 ans et est mariée à un certain Gildas. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Julienne et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges familiales.  Julienne vit au Bénin avec son mari et ses enfants. Julienne n’est jamais allée à l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Julienne mène comme activité depuis trois ans environs, la vente de produits divers (savons, pâtes alimentaires, ustensiles en plastiques, etc.) à son domicile et aussi dans un marché du Bénin. De façon secondaire, Julienne vend également des boissons. C'est dans une ville du Bénin que Julienne s'approvisionne. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle, Julienne sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement YEMALIN DE YEVIE. Leur ambition est d’amener leur activité à un niveau plus élevé.
texts.en:
Group Yemalin de Yevie is composed of 16 members, who all live in the same district. The group's president, named Julienne, is raising her hand in the picture. In order to increase their level of activity and to better meet customer demand, this group is requesting ALIDé's financial support for the first time.
Julienne is 35 years old and married to Gildas. The couple has two children, who both attend school and are in their care. Julienne and her husband provide for the family's multiple needs together. Julienne lives in Benin with her husband and her children. She never went to school. In order to provide for herself and for her family, Julienne has been retailing various products for about three years (soap, pasta, plastic cutlery...), both from her home and at a market in Benin. As a secondary activity, she also sells beverages. She gets her supplies from a city in Benin.
To grow her business and to better satisfy her customers, Julienne is requesting a loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the Yemalin de Yevie members. Their ambition is to bring up their activity level.

loans.use: to buy boxes of soap, pasta, and dozens of plastic utensils.

loans.name: Pomamaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “POMAMAYA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Felisa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comercio, servicios y negocio

La señora Felisa,  indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora en la zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche el cual aprendió de sus padres.

El crédito que solicita es para la compra de alimentos para sus animales, ya que con la crianza de los mismos negocia la venta de leche en las fabricas. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene diez hijos.
texts.en:
The “Pomamaya” communal bank will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana Focal Center.  It has 8 members led by a governing board headed by Felisa.  The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of business activities such as: commerce, services and business.

Felisa indicates that this is the first time they’ve worked with Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution thanks to an invitation from a promoter in the area.  At present, she has a business selling milk that she learned from her parents.

The loan she requests is to buy feed for her animals because with their development she negotiates the milk sales with firms.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family because she’s married and has ten children.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Ángel Bolívar

texts.es:
Ángel Bolívar  tiene 52 años soltero tiene una hija pero no vive con él, vive en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNION se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

 Ángel Bolívar se dedica al cultivo de cacao, maíz,  arroz y plátano. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es  comprar mas terreno para seguir cultivando y aumentar los ingresos.

Le gusta  salir de paseo con la hija y festejar las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Ángel Bolívar, 52, is single.  He has a daughter but she doesn’t live with him.  He lives in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Ángel Bolívar grows cocoa beans, corn, rice and bananas.  He makes his purchases and his sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

He requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizer and manure.  The loan will help him meet his economic needs and improve his farming activities.  He faces challenges like the fall in price of the products he sells and dealing with middlemen. 

His dream is to buy more land to continue farming and increasing income.  He enjoys going on outings with his daughter and celebrating the hamlet’s festivals.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Virgen De Caacupé Group

texts.es:
El comité Virgen D. Caacupé está situado en la ciudad Curuguaty, se encuentran en el primer ciclo del Programa Comité D. Mujeres D. la Fundación. Tiene actualmente 10 integrantes, las cuales se formaron gracias a la iniciativa D. la señora Cecilia, a raíz D. esto han demostrado interés por el programa y por tal motivo se formó el grupo. En este ciclo están aprendiendo el valor D. la comunicación y también la importancia del ahorro y la administración, para así poder enriquecer sus actividades actuales.
La señora Cecilia se dedica a la cría y venta D. animales. Por medio D. este trabajo ella genera los ingresos necesarios para poder mantener a su familia. Comenta que es un trabajo muy sacrificado, ya que la cría D. animales no solo implica trabajo físico, sino también deben ser cuidados para que no se enfermen. Ella desea tener más animales, ya que eso aumentará su inversión y posterior ganancia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. animales y balanceados para los mismos. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
The communal bank Caacupé Virgin is located in the city Curuguaty. They are in the first cycle of the Women's Program Committee of the Foundation. 
Currently the group has 10 members, who came together thanks to the initiative of Cecilia. Because of this, they have shown interest in the program and for this reason the group was formed. In this cycle, they are learning the value of communication and the importance of savings and management to improve their current businesses. 

Cecilia breeds and sells animals. Through this work she makes the income necessary to support her family. She notes that this is very selfless work, since animal breeding is not only physical work, but they also have to be careful not to get sick. She would like to have more animals, since that will increase her investment and subsequent profit. 

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of animals and feed for them. She thanks the Foundation for this unique opportunity.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed for later resale.

loans.name: Fausto Euclides

texts.es:
Fausto Euclides tiene 37 años soltero tiene una hija pero no vive con él de 16 años  vive en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNION se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

 Fausto se dedica al cultivo de cacao, maíz y plátano. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es  tener casa propia para dejar a la hija.

Le gusta  salir de viaje con la hija y pasar con los padres.
texts.en:
Fausto Euclides, 37, is single.  He has a 16 year old daughter but she doesn’t live with him.  He lives in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Fausto grows cocoa beans, corn and bananas.  He makes his purchases and his sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

He requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizer and manure.  The loan will help him meet his economic needs and improve his farming activities.  He faces challenges like the fall in price of the products he sells and dealing with middlemen. 

His dream is to have a house of his own to leave to his daughter and he enjoys going on trips with his daughter and spending time with his parents.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Norma Elizabeth  tiene 38 años casada vive con el esposo y con dos hijos de 13 y 5 años,   vive en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVA UNIONse encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao, arroz, naranja, plátano, café.

 Norma Elizabeth se dedica al cultivo de cacao, maíz, arroz y plátano. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo cada fin de semana. 

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos e insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es  tener casa propia para los hijos.

Le gusta  salir de paseo y festejar las fiestas del recinto bailando.
texts.en:
Norma Elizabeth, 38, is married living with her husband and two children who are 13 and 5 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Nueva Unión” (New Union) communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish belonging to Chillanes Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers, especially of corn, cocoa beans, rice, oranges, bananas and coffee.

Norma Elizabeth grows cocoa beans, corn, rice and bananas.  She makes her purchases and her sales at the San José del Tambo market every weekend.

She requests the loan to buy farming supplies: fertilizer and manure.  The loan will help her meet her economic needs and improve her farming activities.  She faces challenges like the fall in price of the products she sells and dealing with middlemen. 

Her dream is to have a house of her own for her children.  She enjoys going on outings and dancing during the celebration of the hamlet’s festivals.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doris, se dedica a la venta D. panes y hamburguesas, ella vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 16 y 19 años D. edad, su negocio lo administra desD. hace 18 años, surgió por iniciativa propia, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 5:00pm, hasta el momento todo marcha bien.
Ella necesita invertir un préstamo en los ingredientes para los panes y hamburguesas, como lo son carnes, aderezos, pan para las hamburguesas y pan corriente, también comprara gaseosas, esto le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y poder brindar un mejor servicio a los clientes.
Su objetivo es que a través del préstamo mejoren sus posibilidades D. ingresos mayores, para ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Doris sells bread and hamburgers.  She lives with her husband and two children who are 16 and 19 years old.  She’s been running her business for the last 18 years.  It arose through her own initiative.  She’s open from 6am until 5pm.  To date, everything is running smoothly.

She needs to invest the loan in ingredients for the bread and the hamburgers like meat, condiments and bread for the hamburgers and ordinary bread; she will also buy soft-drinks.  This will help her strengthen the business and be able to proviD. better customer service.

Her objective is using the loan to improve her possibility for higher income to help her children with their schooling.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments and bread for hamburgers and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Henry Ely

texts.es:
Henry, es soltero, vive con sus padres, es agricultor, siembra frijol y maíz desde hace 10 años, este trabajo lo aprendió con su padre, colaborándole en las actividades desde que era muy joven, por el momento se encuentra en una nueva tarea de cultivo y quiere comprarse los fertilizantes y herbicidas para aplicarlos al cultivo.
Solicita un financiamiento que le ayude a cubrir el gasto agrícola, esta compra le ayudara para garantizar el desarrollo del maíz, su propósito es ayudar a sus padres con su trabajo, algún día formar su propio hogar y construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Henry is single and lives with his parents.  He is a farmer, and he has been growing beans and corn for ten years.  He learned this work from his father; they worked together in farming activities since he was very young.

He is now planting new crops, and he wants to buy fertilizers and herbicides to apply to the crops.

He is requesting a loan to help him cover the farming expense.  This purchase will help guarnatee the growth of his corn.  His intentions are to help his parents with their work, to someday form his own family, and to build his house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides for his crops.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo est une femme âgée de 29 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur de pièces détachées. Elle a 02 enfants.   
Adjo travaille comme revendeuse de friperie depuis 2003. Elle vend à domicile après achat à HEDZRANAWOE.
Adjo a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des friperies.
texts.en: Adjo is a 29-year-old woman. She is married to a seller of spare parts and has two children. She has been working as a retailer of second-hand clothing since 2003. After making her purchases in HEDZRANAWOE, she makes her sales out of her home. Adjo has requested her first loan cycle at WAGES for buying used clothing.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Afoua

texts.fr:
Afoua est une femme âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur. Elle a 03 enfants.
Afoua travaille comme revendeuse de charbons de bois et céréales depuis 2000. Elle vend dans un marché de la place après achat à Anié. 
Afoua a requis son second  cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des sacs de charbons et des céréales.
texts.en:
Afoua is a 41-year-old woman who is married to a retailer. She has three children. She has been working as a retailer of charcoal and grains since 2000 selling at a local market. She first gets her supplies in Anié. 

Afoua has requested her second loan cycle at WAGES for buying sacks of charcoal and grains.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Gaviotas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “GAVIOTAS” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Betzabe. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de celulares, venta de peluches, venta de comida, venta de tejido, venta de productos de aseo, venta de artículos de novedad, tienda de barrio, tienda de estuquería.

La señora Betzabe,  indica que esta es el quinto mes que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por medio del folleto. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de artículos novedosos, que adquiere según la temporada.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de artículos de novedad), que comprara de Oruro y de la garita y posteriormente  lo venderá en la feria 16 de julio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “Gaviotas” (Seagulls) Communal Bank will begin their second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Cascada regional office.  It is comprised of eight members, and it is managed by a board.  Betzabe is the head of the board.  The members of the communal bank have varied businesses.  Among the businesses that they have are selling cell phones, selling stuffed animals, selling food, selling weavings, selling cleaning products, selling novelty items, a neighborhood store, and a store of decorative moldings done in stucco.

Betzabe indicates that this is the fifth month that she has worked with Pro Mujer, which she joined because of a brochure.  She currently has a business selling novelty items.  She gets them according to the season.

The loan that she will get now is to increase her capital (buy novelty items).  She will buy them in Oruro and La Garita.  She will later sell them at the 16 de Julio market.  This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family as much as possible.  She is in a common-law-marriage, and she has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy novelty items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant vegetables

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
Paulino, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos de 18, 17, 14 y 8 años de edad, él es agricultor, a través de la siembra de maíz y frijol ha logrado por años mantener a su familia, esta actividad se la enseño su padre, y actualmente trabaja de 6:00am a 2:00pm, quiere invertir un préstamo en abono y herbicidas, para proteger las siembras.
La compra le ayudara para que su cultivo se desarrolle y produzca buenos frutos, con el único riesgo que dicho cultivo depende de las condiciones del clima; con la esperanza de tener un buen trabajo al final, aspira contribuir al estudio de sus hijos, apoyándolos en todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Paulino lives with his wife and four children aged 18, 17, 14, and 8. He is a farmer and by planting corn and beans he has managed to support his family for years. He learned his trade from his father. He works each day from 6:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. He wants to use his loan to invest in fertilizer and herbicides to protect his crops. This purchase will help in crop development and production. The only risk is that the crops depend on weather conditions. He hopes to contribute to his children's studies and to support them with whatever they need with the hope of them finding good jobs in the end.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide

loans.name: Elvia Judith

texts.es:
Elvia tiene 29 años es soltera vive en Pujilí cerca de latacunga con sus padres, se describe como una persona muy trabajadora.

Trabaja con sus padres en la crianza de animales para la venta, es la primera vez que trabaja con Fodemi, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de borregos, cerdos, etc para luego venderlos y así poder tener más ingresos y poder estudiar.

Su sueño es tener su propio negocio y poder manejar muy bien el dinero que tenga de los ingresos.
texts.en: Elvia is 29, single and lives in Pujilí (near Latacunga) with her parents.  She is a hard worker and helps her parents raise animals for sale.  This is her first credit with Fodemi, and will be used to buy sheep and pigs to raise and later sell to generate profits and allow her to study.  Elvia dreams of owning her own business with sound management of her earnings.

loans.use: to buy and raise sheep and pigs, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and corn, sauce condiments, and mobile phone recharge cards

loans.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Curuguaty se ha conformado el Comité de Mujeres Santa Librada, el cual se encuentra actualmente en el segundo ciclo del Programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedora de la Fundación Paraguaya. Es un grupo alegre con deseos de superación, demuestran solidaridad entre ellas y ganas de salir adelante como personas y como grupo.
La señora Nilsa se dedica a la venta de prendas desde hace ya mucho tiempo. Comenta que gracias a este trabajo ella ha podido salir adelante y generar los ingresos necesarios para paliar los gastos que surgen el día a día. Uno de sus proyectos es tener un local donde pueda tener las ropas que vende, ya que por medio de esto atraerá más clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, para la posterior venta. Tiene las esperanzas puestas en el crédito, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The women’s communal bank Santa Librada was formed in the city of Curuguaty. They are currently in their second loan cycle with the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program with the Fundación Paraguaya.  This is a joyful group that desires to overcome obstacles.  They show solidarity with each other and wish to make progress as individuals and as a group.

Nilsa has been selling clothes for a long time.  She says that thanks to this work she has been able to go forward and make the income necessary to manage her expenses, which grow day after day.  One of her goals is to have a location where she can sell her clothes, which would allow her to attract more customers.

She is seeking this loan in order to buy clothes for resale.  She sincerely hopes to obtain this loan, as it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 5 y un año de edad, él es agricultor, siembra hortalizas, este cultivo lo aprendió por necesidad, las hortalizas las siembra con tomates, ejotes, repollo, maíz y frijol; él necesita comprar abono, semillas de tomates y chile, además tela para proteger las hortalizas, por eso solicita un préstamo que será una gran ayuda para cubrir el gasto necesario de su trabajo.
Juan aplica mucha dedicación al trabajo, esto le ayuda para salir con cada cosecha, los sueños de él es que sus hijos crezcan, y tengan una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and two children aged 5 and 1.  He is a farmer and grows vegetables; a business that he learned through necessity.  He grows tomatoes, green beans, cabbage, corn and kidney beans.  Juan needs to buy manure, tomato and chili seeds, and material to protect his crops.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan which will be a great help to him in covering his necessary work expenses.

Juan does his work with a lot of commitment.  This helps him to do well with each harvest.  His dreams are for his children to grow and enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy manure, tomato and chili seeds, and material to protect his crops

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Ocongate, en la Provincia de Quispicanchis y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la señora Vilma; la socia es casada y tiene 49 años de edad, la socia tiene 4 hijos; la socia trabaja en su propia tienda de abarrotes, atendiendo y administrando, la socia siempre que puede compra sus diversos productos de primera necesidad, la socia compra al por mayor harinas, azúcar, fideos, arroz, leche en cajas, gelatinas y otros productos de primera necesidad que salen a diario, la socia requiere invertir en la compra de productos para implementar su tienda de abarrotes ella comprara diversos productos de primera necesidad como los antes mencionados.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the 'Las Margaritas de Ocongate' community bank which is located in Ocongate district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Vilma is 49 years old, married, and has four children.  She manages and serves in her own grocery store.  Whenever she can, she buys a range of essential household products wholesale.  She buys flour, sugar, noodles, rice, boxes of milk, Jell-O and other basic household products which sell every day.  Vilma needs to buy products to stock her grocery store.  She will buy a range of basic household products such as those previously mentioned.

Vilma is grateful for the support that she will be given and she pledges to make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying products to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home

loans.name: Clorinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Ocongate, en la Provincia de Quispicanchis y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la señora Clorinda; la socia es casada y tiene 44 años de edad, la socia tiene 2 hijos; la socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cría cuyes al por mayor, ella cría alrededor de 200 cuyes amas y ahora también se dedica  a la crianza de truchas, la socia tiene una pequeña picigranja en su domicilio y está continuamente implementando su criadero de truchas y para ello ella requiere el préstamo para implementar los pozos, el cuidado del agua, la compra de truchas bebes para incrementar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de truchas bebes, también de animales menores como cuyes para aumentar su negocio.  

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en: Clorinda is 44 and married, with 2 children; she is a member of the communal bank "Margaritas de Ocongate" in Quispicanchis, Cusco.  She raises small animals, buying them wholesale, and has nearly 200 cuyes (guinea pigs).  She also raises trout in a small fish farm she operates at home, and seeks this credit to put in new tanks of treated water as well as buy stock of fish hatchlings to raise and in this way grow her business.  Clorinda is grateful for the support given to her and is committed to prompt repayment of the funds borrowed.

loans.use: to buy stock of trout and cuyes (small animals) to raise and sell

loans.name: El Edén Group

texts.es:
El Comité El Edén, se conformó con la iniciativa de la señora Silvina, actualmente cuenta con 10 mujeres, se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres. Ellas se reúnen con el propósito de constituirse en un comité que no solo las haga crecen económicamente, sino también como personas. Todas han demostrado unión y solidaridad las unas con las otras.
Todas ellas son mujeres, muy sacrificadas, cuentan con escasos recursos. Participan  de las ferias organizadas por Fundación Paraguaya, en donde comercializan sus productos para para seguir aumentando sus ingresos.
La señora Maria tiene un copetín (establecimiento de venta de comidas rápidas), se dedica a esto hace un tiempo. Comenta que los alimentos que elabora son muy solicitados, ya que tiene muy buena sazón. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener un restaurante donde pueda seguir con la produccion y venta de alimentos. Con lo que respecta a los clientes, dice que tiene muy buena clientela en su barrio y zonas aledañas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de los alimentos, como ser carnes, condimentos, panificados, hortalizas y demás.
texts.en:
The "El Edén" committee was formed on the initiative of Señora Silvina, and currently has 10 women.  They are in their first lending cycle as part of the women's program.  They meet with the goal of becoming a commitee that does not just create growth for them economically, but also as people.  All of them have demonstrated unity and solidarity with each other.

They are all women and all very self-sacrificing with limited means.  They participate in the parties organized by Fundación Paraguaya, where they sell their products so as to be able to continue growing their incomes.

Señora Maria has a "copetín", (an establishment selling fast food), where she has worked for a while.  She comments that the food she makes is much in demand, as it tastes really good.  One of her dreams is to be able to have a restaurant where she can continue with the production and selling of food.  With regard to her customers, she says that she has a very good customer base from her neighborhood and the surrounding areas.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of necessary supplies for making her food, such as meat, condiments, baked goods, vegetables and other items.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, baked goods, vegetables and other items

loans.name: Tugirubukire A / Rbv Group

texts.fr:
Jean Pierre  est agriculteur de pomme de terre et il est membre du groupe Tugirubukire A. Il est né au Rwanda et a 31 ans. Il est marié et il a 2 enfants de 3 à 8 ans, dont aucun enfant  scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de secondaire(A2). 
C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter un champ, 500kgs des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre. 
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘améliorer son activité actuelle d’agriculture de pommes de terre en achetant d’autre champs. Dans les prochaines années, Jean Pierre  voudrait être un grand distributeur  de pommes de terre dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et des frais médicaux, et bâtir une maison pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Jean Pierre is a potato farmer, and he is a member of the group Tugirubukire A. He was born in Rwanda and is 31 years old. He is married and has two children, aged 3 to 8 years. None of the children is in school. He has six years of secondary education (A2). 

This loan cycle is his first one with ACB. He is going to use it to buy a field and 500 kg of fertilizer and to pay for labor. 

His strategy for the growth of his business is to improve his current business farming potatoes by buying another field. In the next few years, Jean Pierre would like to be a big distributor of potatoes in his region. With the profits, he foresees covering his children's schooling and medical costs and building a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy a field and 500 kg of fertilizer and to pay for labor

loans.name: Yonis

texts.es:
Yonis, vive con su familia, conformada por su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, tiene 10 años dedicándose a esta actividad, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
Quiere invertir un préstamo en abono y herbicidas, estos materiales son muy necesarios para el desarrollo del cultivo y para protegerlo de plagas, al aplicarlos estará más seguro de la producción que puede lograr, garantizándole a su familia alimentación para un periodo.
Para Yonis, el cultivo es muy necesario, a parte que lo realiza desde hace algún tiempo, es el que le ayuda para apoyar a sus hijos y su esposa.
texts.en:
Yonis lives with his family which consists of his wife and two children.  He grows corn and beans and has been in this business for 10 years.  He works every day from 6.00am to 3.00pm.

Yonis would like to invest his loan in buying fertilizers and herbicides.  These materials are necessary for his crops to develop and so that he can protect them from pests.  By applying them, he will be more certain of the production he will be able to achieve, guaranteeing his family has food for a period of time.

Yonis needs to grow his crops.  As well as having been doing it for some time, it is also how he supports his children and his wife.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Don De Dieu Group

texts.fr: DON DE DIEU est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent ensemble dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Marie (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 44 ans. Marie est mariée à un certain Robert. Le couple a quatre enfants à charge, tous scolarisés, dont trois sont à leur charge. Marie vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari au Bénin. Le couple supporte ensemble les diverses charges familiales.  Pour se prendre en charge et assurer les besoins de ses enfants, Marie mène comme activité depuis une quinzaine d'année, la vente de la nourriture (pâte de maïs accompagné de poissons frits et de sauce). Marie s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. C'est la troisième fois que Marie sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit permettra à Marie et aux autres membres du groupe DON DE DIEU, de renforcer leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
DON DE DIEU is a group of three persons whose members lives together in the same district. The group's representative, Marie (with her hand raised in the photo), is 44 years old and married to a man named Robert. They support four children, who are all in school. Three of the children are [their own]. Marie lives together with her children and her husband in Benin. They jointly cover the various family expenses. 

To support herself and to ensure her children's needs are met, Marie has been running a business for about fifteen years selling meals (polenta with fried fish and sauce). She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

This is the third time that she has requested a loan from ALIDé. This loan will enable her and the other members of the group DON DE DIEU to bolster their business and to respond better to the requirements of their customers.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn, fresh fish, and condiments for making sauces

loans.name: Lisbeht

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Ocongate, en la Provincia de Quispicanchis y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la señora Lisbeht; la socia es conviviente y tiene  21 años de edad, la socia tiene 1 hijo; la socia trabaja en la atención de su librería, la socia tiene una pequeña librería y ella administra y atiende su librería, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cuadernos, papel lustre, útiles escolares como lapiceros, pinceles, borradores, colores entre otros; La socia solicita comprar materiales de librería así como papel lustre, von, lapiceros entre otros.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE” communal bank. The bank is located in the District of Ocongate, in Quispicanchis Province in Cusco Department.

This member is Señora Lisbeht. She lives in a common-law marriage, is 21 years old and has 1 child.  She has a small bookstore that she manages. She needs a loan to buy notebooks, lustre paper, bond paper and other school supplies such as ballpoint pens, paintbrushes, erasers and paints among others.

Lisbeht is grateful for the support provided her and is committed to making her payments on time

loans.use: to buy bookstore supplies such as lustre paper, bond, ballpoint pens among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 35 years old and married.  She has one child, aged ten years. She runs a provision store in Tengbeh town, the western part of Freetown.

Emma has been in this business for 7 years and sells Ovaltine, milk, sugar, sardines, etc., at her store. She says that her business is doing well.

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more sugar, milk and cocoa. Emma says that the extra income from this loan will help her to educate her child. In the future, she would like to see her business expand more.

loans.use: To purchase more sugar, milk, cocoa, and sardines.

loans.name: Virgen De Fátima Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado Virgen de Fátima se conforma gracias a una de las miembros. Actualmente el grupo cuenta con 10 integrantes y se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras. Todas ellas son mujeres luchadoras y por sobre todo muy trabajadoras. Se unieron con el objetivo de generar un ingreso para sus familias, para que de esa forma puedan aportar en los gastos de la casa.
La señora Viviana es lavandera, comenta que es un trabajo muy duró puesto que debe cumplir en tiempo con los encargos de los clientes. De todos lados recibe las prendas que debe lavar, en cuanto a eso no tiene quejas. Uno de sus propósitos es mejorar su lavandería para que de esa forma pueda atraer a más clientes. Está muy orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo digno y humilde.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de jabones en polvo, suavizantes de ropas y demás insumos necesarios para su trabajo. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
The communal bank named Virgen de Fátima (Virgin of Fátima) was formed thanks to one of its members. Today the group has 10 members and they are in the first loan cycle of the program for enterprising women. All of them are fighters and, above all, very hardworking women. They have come together with the goal of making an income for their families so that they can contribute to household expenses. 

Viviana is a laundress and she says that it's very hard work because she must meet her customers' orders on time. From all around her she receives garments to be washed, which she has no complaints about. One of her goals is to improve her landromat in order to attract more customers. She is very proud of what she does since it's dignified and humble work. 

She requests the loan to purchase washing powder, laundry softener and other supplies that are necessary for her work. She thanks the Fundación for the opportunity she is given.

loans.use: to purchase laundry soap, detergent and softener.

loans.name: Jose Adrian

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa, se dedica al cultivo de maíz e integra un mariachi, con el que brinda eventos por las noches, el cultivo lo realiza desde hace 20 años y la música la realiza con más anticipación, trabaja todos los días atendiendo sus dos actividades desde las 7:00am a 9:00pm.
El invertirá su préstamo en abono, tratamientos para plagas, los cuales aplicara en los cultivos, esto fortalecerá la plantación y la protegerá de posibles plagas, el propósito de José es mejorar su trabajo, para poder vivir con su esposa con una vida digna, en un hogar más seguro.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife.  He grows corn, and he is part of a mariachi group.  The group offers events for the evenings.  He has been farming for 20 years, and he performs music with advance notice.  He works every day tending to both of his businesses from 7:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. 

He will use the loan to buy fertilizer and treatments for pest infestations.  He will apply them to his crops, and this will strengthen his crops and protect them from possible pest infestations.  José’s intention is to improve his work in order to be able to live a decent life with his wife in a more secure home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and treatments for pest infestations.

loans.name: Alokplegbe Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe ALOKPLEGBE est formé de trois personnes qui appartiennent à une même association de femmes. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Agathe, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. 
Agathe est mariée à un transitaire du nom de Bonaventure. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés. Agathe et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs deux enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Il y a près de neuf ans que Agathe mène comme activité la vente de tissus et de mèches par le système de distribution. Parallèlement à cette activité, Agathe vend des vernis. Agathe s'approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Agathe désire obtenir un autre financement, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ALOKPLEGBE.
texts.en:
The group ALOKPLEGBE is comprised of three persons who belong to the same women's association. The representative of this group is named Agathe, who has her hand raised in the photo. This is the third time that this group has requested financial support from ALIDé with the aim of elevating their level of business. 

Agathe is married to a shipping agent by the name Bonaventure. They have two children who are both in school. Agathe and her husband live together with their two children. The couple jointly ensures that the various family expenses are covered.  

For nearly nine years, Agathe has been running a business selling cloth and hair extensions through the distribution system. Concurrent to this business, she sells nail polish. She gets her supplies from a city in Benin. 

With the goal of bolstering her business and responding better to customer demand, Agathe and the other members of the group ALOKPLEGBE would like to obtain another loan.

loans.use: to buy cloth, hair extensions, and nail polish

loans.name: Joseline Patricia

texts.es:
Joseline, está soltera, vive con sus padres, ella estudia en la universidad, se auto financia los gastos universitarios con una iniciativa, vendiendo lociones y cosméticos, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 6 años, atiende el negocio de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella invertirá el préstamo en la compra de lociones de diferentes marcas, las que son ofrecidas en las revistas como AVON, ESIKA, también comprara maquillajes, sombras, rubor, para ofrecer a los clientes, y esta inversión le permita tener mejores ganancias.
El sueño de Joseline es terminar sus estudios Universitarios, poder superarse no solo académicamente sino que también en el negocio, ayudando a sus padres en lo más posible.
texts.en:
Joseline is single and lives with her parents. She is a university student, and self-finances her university expenses through her business selling lotions and cosmetics.  She has had this business for 6 years, and works at it from 7:00am to 4:00pm.  

She will use the loan to buy different brands of lotions; the ones that are featured in magazines like Avon and Esika.  She will also buy make-up, eye shadows, and blush to sell to her customers. This investment will allow her to improve her earnings.  

Joseline's dream is to complete her university studies and to excel not only academically, but also in business; helping her parents as much as possible.

loans.use: To buy make-up, eye shadow, blush. and different brands of lotions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, roasted pork, and beans.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is 48 years old and divorced with four children, age 11 to 30. She runs a furniture store in Kroo town in the central part of Freetown. She has four employees working with her. She also takes care of four relatives. 

Gladys has been in this business for 10 years and sells beds, chairs, mirror glass and dining tables at her store. She also earns income from supplying imported eggs to customers. She says that the main challenge to her business is the problem of transportation from one place to another.

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more timber for her furniture business. Gladys says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her business. In the future, she would like to open a showroom.

loans.use: To purchase more timber for her furniture business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials to make baskets

loans.name: Ana Lidia Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana Lidia, D. cincuenta y siete años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y su hijo en casa propia que gracias a mucho esfuerzo continuan pagando en zona urbana del país. Ella posee un comedor en el lugar D. su residencia y es muy conocido en la zona, por el rico sazón que Ana Lidia le da a las comidas que prepara, ricos desayunos y almuerzos los cuales los clientes disfrutan a un excelente precio en un lugar agradable y limpio; Ana es trabajadora y emprendedora, siempre se encuentra activa y con alegría D. recibir a la clientela. Ana está dispuesta a recibir el éxito en su vida es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  materia prima para sus comidas como granos básicos, carnes, embutidos, lácteos, verduras, bebidas entre otros. Ana Lidia tiene la confianza que así lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Ana Lidia, 57, lives with her life partner and her son in her own house that, thanks to a great deal of effort, they continue paying for in an urban area of the city. She has a restaurant in her residence that is very well known in the area because of the delicious flavor of the food she prepares, tasty breakfasts and lunches which her customers enjoy at an excellent price in clean and pleasant surroundings. Ana is hardworking and enterprising. You always find her busy and ready to happily receive her customers. She is also ready to achieve success in her life and because of this she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy raw materials for her meals such as bulk grains, meat, sausages, milk, vegetables and beverages, among other supplies. Ana Lidia is confident that in this way she will succeed in giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains, meat, sausages, milk, vegetables, beverages

loans.name: Gregoria Hortensia

texts.es: Gregoria Hortensia  de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive con sus hijos que ya son mayores de edad y quienes ya aportan para el sostenimiento del hogar. Gregoria posee una tortillería desde hace muchos años y gracias a la cual pudo criar a sus hijos, sus tortillas son las más vendidas del lugar pues son muy ricas, la atención es rápida y las vende a un buen precio; Gregoria es una mujer llena de metas que está dispuesta a cumplir, ella piensa que la fe en el éxito garantiza los resultados, quiere ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo en su negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela. Gregoria Hortensia no se atiene al aporte económico de sus hijos y ella dice que mientras exista vida continuará trabajando para darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Gregoria Hortensia, 45, lives with her children, who are now adults and contribute to the maintenance of the home. Gregoria has had a tortilla business for many years, thanks to which she was able to raise her children. Her tortillas are the most widely sold in the area since they are quite delicious. Turnover is rapid and she sells them at a good price. Gregoria is a woman full of goals she is ready to achieve. She thinks that having faith that she will succeed will guarantee those results. She wants to see her business grow and for that reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. The loan will enable her to buy corn wholesale so she can continue producing tortillas and satisfying the demands of her customers. Gregoria Hortensia cannot always rely on the economic support of her children and she says that as long as she is alive she will continue working in order to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Señor De Los Milagros Group

texts.es: LA SRA SARA D. 37  AÑOS D. EDAD ,SOLTERA  CON DOS HIJOS MENORES D. 12 Y 5 AÑOS D. EDAD  EN ETAPA ESCOLAR.LA SRA SARA ES SOCIA DEL GRUPO  SEÑOR D. LOS MILAGROS ,LA  SRA SARA  Y TODOS LOS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO SEÑOR D. LOS MILAGROS PROMETEN SER PUNTUALES  EN SUS SUS CUOTAS D. LOS PROXIMOS MESES  .LA  SRA SARA ACTUALMENTE TIENE SU SALON  D. BELLEZA UBICADA EN LA  AVENIDA CIRO ALEGRIA  NUMERO  643.LA SRA SARA  SOLICITA ESTE PRESTAMO PARA PODER  COMPRAR UNA SECADORA  Y ASI PODER MEJORAR SU NEGOCIO CON MAQUINAS D. ULTIMA TECNOLOGIA .LA SRA SARA QUISIERA PARA EL FUTURO  SACAR A SUS HIJOS PROFESIONALES  Y CONTAR CON UNA SUCURSAL MAS D. SU NEGOCIO .LA SRA  SARA  SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA  A LADO IZQUIERDO  D. LA SEÑORA  QUE VISTE  UNA CHOMPA COLOR CELESTE Y TIENE EN BRAZOS A SU HIJA .LA SRA SARA ESTA SENTADA Y VISTE UNA CHOMPA COLOR NEGRO
texts.en: Sara is 37 years old. She is single and has two minor children aged 12 and 5, who go to school. Sara is a member of the Señor D. los Milagros group. Sara and all of the members of the Señor D. los Milagros promise to make their payments on time in the coming months. At present, Sara has a beauty salon located on Avenida Ciro Alegria number 643. Sara is asking for the loan to be able to buy a dryer and thus improve her business with machines with the latest technology. In the future, Sara would like to have her children learn a profession and open another branch of her business. Sara is to the left of the woman in a light blue sweater and is carrying her daughter. Sara is seated and wearing a black sweater.

loans.use: to be able to buy a dryer.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, vive con su familia: su esposa y siete hijos, de las edades de 18, 17, 13 y 13(gemelos), 9, 7 y 5 años, él se dedica a la ganadería, inicio trabajando con su padre cuando era muy pequeño, su horario actual de trabajo es de 4:00am a 3:00pm. El está en planes de comprar ganado y sembrar maíz, para esto comprara  abono y tratamiento para plagas a través de un préstamo, pues son materiales que a todo agricultor en pleno proceso de siembra no deben faltar.
Su objetivo es tener lo necesario para proteger el cultivo y producir buena cosecha, ya que cuando es buena la producción, puede vender una parte y obtener ganancias, para ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Pedro lives with his family, his wife and seven children, aged 18, 17, 13 and 13 (twins), 9, 7 and 5 years old. He works with cattle. He started working with his father when he was little. His present work schedule is from 4:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. He plans on buying cattle and planting corn. For this he will buy fertilizer and treatment for pests via a loan. These are materials that every farmer in the midst of planting mustn't lack.

His goal is to have everything he needs to protect his crop and produce a good harvest. When production is good, he can sell a portion and have earnings to help his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and treatment for pests.

loans.name: Lonlongnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LONLONGNON est formé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Davigan, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Davigan est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Adam. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Davigan vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la famille sont supportées de façon conjointe par Davigan et son mari. Il y a près de seize ans que Davigan mène comme activité, la vente de produits divers (condiments de sauce, conserves, huile de palme, etc.) dans son quartier. Davigan s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Davigan désire obtenir un autre crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe LONLONGNON.
texts.en:
The LONLONGNON group is made up of 3 people who live in the same area. Davigan, the group's leader, is the one in the picture with her hand raised. The group is applying for a third loan from ALIDé in order to increase their business activity.
Davigan is married to Adam, a carpenter. The couple live together with their 3 children, who are all in school. Davigan and Adam both contribute to their family's upkeep. Davigan has been selling staple goods (condiments, canned goods, palm oil, etc.) in her area for nearly 16 years. She gets her supplies in Benin. In order to increase stock to meet customer demand, Davigan is requesting this new loan, together with the LONLONGNON group.

loans.use: to buy boxes of canned goods and condiments (tomatoes, peppers, palm oil, etc.)

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy Antonio vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en una zona muy pobre del país. El posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, su tienda en muy visitada por las personas de la zona pues siempre encuentran lo que necesitan, productos de buena calidad a un precio accesible; Freddy Antonio es un hombre trabajador con muchas expectativas para el futuro, él está dispuesto a superarse y como ha tenido mucha demanda en el negocio se ha decidido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, aceite, productos instantáneo, condimentos, entre otros. Freddy Antonio tiene la esperanza que así lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Freddy Antonio lives with his life partner and their children in a very poor region of the country. He has a store in his home where he sells basic necessities. His store is frequented by people in the area who are always looking for what they need, which are good-quality products at an affordable price. Freddy Antonio is a hardworking gentleman who has many expectations for the future and is determined to succeed.

Since there is great demand for his business, he has decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral so that he can buy basic grains, oil, instant-prepared products, condiments, and other items. Freddy Antonio is hopeful of being able to provide his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, instant-prepared products, condiments, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more lace and male and female African dress.

loans.name: La Cantera Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “La Cantera” está conformado por 18 emprendedores que se dedican al rubro del comercio, específicamente venta de ropa, preparación y venta de comida rápida, además de restaurante. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Osorno.
Myrtha  quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila, ocupando el segundo puesto de derecha a izquierda, usa una chaqueta color café, polera color blanco y anteojos. Ella se dedica al rubro del comercio, específicamente a la venta de ropa, desde hace 6 años. Su puesto lo ubica en ferias libres, los días domingos y miércoles. Su mercadería en ropa es diversa, ya que generalmente sus productos son para todas las edades y personas.
Su mercadería usualmente la compra por encargo a su hermana quien vive en la ciudad de Santiago, ella es quien compra ropa nueva en distribuidoras y se la envía por encomienda.
Con el crédito comprará ropa nueva. 
Sus metas son continuar con el negocio, para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Myrtha vive junto a su hija de 20 años de edad, quien estudia en la Universidad la carrera de pedagogía. Sus sueños son esperar a que su hija termine de estudiar y se titule, para ver su tarea cumplida.
Myrtha está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito y servicios otorgados por Fondo Esperanza. Además comenta que se siente muy cómoda con las reuniones y grupo del Banco comunal, ya que existe generosidad y unidad. 
Osorno es una ciudad que se ubica en la zona sur de Chile, región de Los Lagos. Es un importante centro agropecuario que se identifica como "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" de Chile. Dentro de su actividad agropecuaria se destaca el cultivo de trigo y avena, la crianza de ganado, para el procesamiento de carnes y lácteos además de la fabricación de equipos agrarios.
Destaca en Osorno el único estadio de fútbol techado de Chile, el Estadio Municipal "Rubén Marcos”.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called “La Cantera” (The Quarry) and consists of 18 entrepreneurs who engage in the retail trade, specifically selling clothes, preparing and selling fast food, and managing a restaurant. All of the members are from the city of Osorno.

In the photograph, Myrtha is seated on the first row, second from the right. She is wearing a coffee-colored jacket, a white turtleneck sweater, and eyeglasses. Myrtha has been in the retail trade, specifically selling clothes, for the past six years. Her vending stall is located at the open fair, where she sells on Sundays and Wednesdays. The merchandise that she offers varies, but generally she carries clothes for all ages and sizes. The responsibility for buying the clothes is left to her sister who lives in the city of Santiago. She buys the new garments from the distributors and then ships them through the mail. With this loan, Myrtha will buy new clothing. Her goals are to continue with her business, generate more income, and achieve a better quality of life.

Myrtha lives with her 20-year-old daughter who is a university student studying for a degree in Education. Her dreams include seeing her daughter finish her studies and receive her degree. She would love to see this task completed.

Myrtha is very pleased with and appreciative of the loan and services provided by Fondo Esperanza. In addition, she says that she feels very comfortable in the meetings and with her Communal Bank group, which has displayed generosity and unity.

Osorno is a city located in southern Chile, in Los Lagos region. It is an important agricultural center and has been given the nickname of “The Homeland of Milk and Beef” for all of Chile. The agricultural activities that take place in the area include the cultivation of wheat and oats, livestock breeding, meat and milk processing, and the manufacture of farming equipment. Osorno is also the home of the only covered soccer stadium in Chile, the Rubén Marcos Municipal Stadium.

loans.use: to buy new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jose Felipe

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 9, 4 y 2 años de edad, él administra una tienda, donde ofrece a los vecinos del lugar,  todo lo relacionado a productos no perecederos, como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, tiene 3 años de estar establecido, este negocio le ayuda para solventar de sus ganancias las necesidades de su familia.
