Invertirá su préstamo en mercadería, como aceite, pastas, pan, boquitas y gaseosa, además comprara pollos de engorde para instalar una granja, este préstamo le ayudara para superarse, teniendo bien surtida la tienda y también con el nuevo negocio de las gallinas, él espera tener mejores ingresos y más afluencia de clientes, para que su negocio sea rentable; También ayudar a sus hijos para que puedan estudiar y que en el hogar no falte la alimentación.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and three children (ages 9, 4, and 2). He manages a store where he offers his neighbors all types of nonperishable products such as beans, rice, soap, and detergents. José established this business three years ago and it has helped him generate income to meet the needs of his family.

He will invest this loan in merchandise such as oil, noodles, bread, snacks, and sodas. In addition, he will buy chickens to fatten so that he can start a poultry farm. This loan will help him to get ahead, be well-stocked, and also start a new poultry business. José hopes to generate better income and have more customer traffic so that his business can be profitable. He also wants to help his children with their education and see that they lack nothing to eat.

loans.use: to buy oil, noodles, bread, snacks, and sodas for his store and to acquire chickens for starting a poultry business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics in bulk, thread, needles, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ofelia Mabel

texts.es:
Ofelia, se dedica a la venta D. frutas, tiene 3 hijas pero actualmente vive solo con una, la cual está casada y posee dos hijos, el negocio D. las frutas lo tiene desD. hace 10 años, viaja por los pueblos cercanos para ofrecer los productos.
Actualmente su negocio necesita una inversión D. frutas, por eso a través del préstamo obtendrá lo que necesita como manzanas, bananas, fresas, sandia, con esta compra ella podrá mejorar la disponibilidad D. frutas para los clientes y continuar vendiendo.
El propósito con el préstamo es abrir las puertas D. la institución para continuar recibiendo el apoyo financiero, además D. mejorar también su condición D. comerciante.
texts.en:
Ofelia sells fruit for a living. She has three daughters, but only one of them lives with her at the moment. The daughter who lives with her is married and has two children. Ofelia has been in the business of selling fruit for 10 years. She travels to nearby towns to offer her products.

Ofelia currently needs to invest in fruit for her business. For this reason, the loan she will obtain will enable her to buy what she needs such as apples, bananas, strawberries, and watermelons. With this purchase, she will improve her inventory of fruit for her customers and continue selling.

One reason for requesting this loan is to open doors with PADECOMSM so that she can continue receiving financial support. She will also improve her status as a merchant.

loans.use: to buy applies, bananas, strawberries, and watermelons.

loans.name: Karla Verónica

texts.es: Karla Verónica de veinte años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo. Ella posee una sala de belleza muy famosa en el lugar donde residen se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues ella realiza los mejores cortes, tintes, maquillajes entre otros tiene una calidad de trabajo inigualable y la gente la prefiere porque da buen servicio siempre los recibe muy contenta con una sonrisa en el rostro además los precios son muy accesibles; ella trata siempre de estar atenta a las tendencias de la época y se actualiza con seminarios en los que ella invierte, Karla Verónica es una joven de sueños para ella no  hay montaña tan alta, siempre quiere alcanzar la cima, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tintes, cosméticos, peines, shampo entre otros. Karla Verónica tiene confianza que su trabajo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Karla Verónica is 20 years old and lives with her son and her life partner. She has a beauty salon that is well-known in the place where she lives. Karla has many customers who request makeovers, haircuts, coloring, make-up, and other services. The quality of her work is unequaled. People prefer to do business with her because she provides good service and always welcomes her customers happily with a smile on her face. In addition, her prices are very affordable. Karla always tries to keep up with seasonal trends and is currently investing her time in seminars. She is a young woman with dreams, but there is no mountain too high that she isn't willing to climb.

For this reason, Karla Verónica is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so that she can buy dyes, cosmetics, combs, shampoo, and other supplies. She is confident that her work will give her the opportunity to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy dyes, cosmetics, combs, shampoo, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for growing coffee.

loans.name: Silvia Raquel

texts.es: Silvia Raquel vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en una localidad muy concurrida de personas, ella posee una tortillería en su residencia y últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues Silvia despacha las tortillas rápido y muy calientitas al gusto del cliente, además que tienen un buen precio y el lugar de venta es muy higiénico; Silvia Raquel es una mujer muy inteligente y siempre esta adelante de la competencia su clave para el éxito es la persistencia y dedicación en el trabajo quiere que el negocio crezca es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y así adquirirlo a menor precio del que actualmente le ofrecen y con la finalidad de que ello le genere mayor ganancia. Silvia Raquel tiene fe que su trabajo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Silvia Raquel lives with her life partner and their children in a busy town that is full of people. She has a tortilla shop in her home and lately she has received many customers. As a result, Silvia has had to produce hot tortillas quickly in order to keep her customers happy. In addition, she offers very good prices and keeps her premises spotlessly clean.

Silvia Raquel is a very intelligent woman who is always staying ahead of the competition. The key to her success is her persistence and dedication to her work. Silvia Raquel wants her business to grow, so she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so that she can buy corn in bulk at a price that is lower that what is currently offered, which will help her generate more income. She has faith that her work will provide her family the opportunity to have a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es: Doña Santos tiene 39 años de edad, tiene tres hijos varones y dos hijas mujeres, su esposo se dedica a trabajar la tierra, y su residencia se encuentra en la Comunidad de Las Américas en el Municipio de Patuca. Doña Santos inició su vida laboral vendiendo nacatamales, luego de un tiempo con las ganancias que lograba ir obteniendo se le ocurrió la idea de comprar una bolsa de churros y la colgó en la pared frontal de su vivienda y los niños que pasaban por allí para ir a la escuela se los compraban, así que luego pensó en vender abarroteria en general e hizo un pequeño espacio en su casa para instalar unos estantes y asi comenzar a comprar todo tipo de productos, aunque no fueron muchos los productos que compró ya que no contaba con el capital suficiente pero ahora con los prestamos que ha obtenido en FAMA poco a poco a ido surtiendo su pulperia. Su horario de atención es de 7:00 am a 7:00 pm, y cuando sus hijos regresan de clases le ayudan a atender la pulperia. El mayor desafio que enfrenta Doña Santos es que el lugar donde ella reside es un tanto retirado de la principal via de acceso al Municipio y el acarreo de los productos se le es muy dificil y ademas el costo del transporte es caro, por eso su meta es llegar a tener un carrito pick-up y que sus hijos culminen sus estudios. Doña Santos solicita el prestamo para comprar productos como arroz, azucar, manteca, jabon de lavar ropa y trastes, refrescos, frijoles, café, pan, churros, dulces, jugos, entre otros. Actualmente tiene cinco ciclos en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Doña Santos is 39 years old and has three sons and two daughters. Her husband is in charge of working their land. Their home is located in the community of Las Américas in the town of Patuca. Doña Santos started earning her livelihood by selling tamales. Sometime later she bought a bag of donuts and came up with the idea of starting a new business. She used her earnings to begin placing bags of donuts on the front wall of her home so that children passing by on their way to school could buy them. Santos later thought about selling groceries and set aside a small space in her house for installing a few shelves so that she could begin selling all types of products. She was not able to buy many products since she did not have sufficient capital, but now that she has access to loans from FAMA, Santos is able to gradually stock her store. Her schedule of operation is from 7am to 7pm. When her children come home from school, they help with managing the store. The greatest challenge that Doña Santos faces is the location of her home, which is some distance from the main road that leads to town. This makes it difficult to have products delivered and the cost of transportation is expensive. For this reason, her goals are to acquire a small pick-up truck and to help her children finish their studies.

Doña Santos is requesting a loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, lard, laundry detergent, dish soap, soft drinks, beans, coffee, bread, donuts, candy, juices, and other products. As of now, she has participated in five loan cycles with FAMA and has completed her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: José Arístides

texts.es: José Arístides de sesenta y tres años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo. El posee un molino con el cual presta servicio desde muy temprano pues al que madruga Dios le ayuda, él muele en su molino desde hace años café, arrina de arroz, maíz con el que se hacen las tortillas y pupusas, frijoles, chicharron, horchata, cebada, yuca entre muchas otras cosas mas. Siempre está a disposición del cliente, y por eso las personas llegan buscarles, es esa experiencia la que ha hecho que últimamente la demanda del servicio aumente, además de que las personas prefieran sus precios cómodos y lo higiénico del lugar; en esta temporada del año las personas muelen mucho el elote que usan para preparar atole, riguas, tortas de elote entre otras exquisiteses de la época. José está muy entusiasmado en ver crecer su negocio y como es un hombre decidido y dispuesto a alcanzar el éxito se ha decido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita dar mantenimiento del molino, comprar discos, limas, grasa y reparación de algunas fajas. José Aristisides tiene confianza que su trabajo le permitirá darle seguridad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
José Arístides is 63 years old and lives with his life partner and their son. He operates a mill and provides his service from the very early hours of the morning. For many years, José has used his mill for grinding coffee, rice flour, corn for making tortillas and “pupusas”, beans, pork, tigernuts, barley, cassava, and other items. He is always at the disposal of his customers, which is why people seek his services. Their experiences with him have caused a recent increase in demand for his services. Customers also prefer to do business with him because he charges affordable prices and keeps his facilities spotless. During this time of year, people grind large amounts of corn for making “atole”, corn pancakes, sweet corn cakes, and other seasonal treats.

José is very excited about seeing his business grow. Being the type of man who is prepared and willing to become successful, he has decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral to pay for maintenance of his mill. He will buy discs, files, and grease. José will also pay to have some of the belts repaired. He is confident that his work will allow him to provide financial security for his family.

loans.use: to buy parts and pay for repairs to maintain his mill.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to care for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Nonvignon Gbe Group

texts.fr: Le groupement NONVIGNON GBE est composé de vingt sept membres qui se connaissent parce qu’elles habitent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La présidente de ce groupement, du nom de Célestine, est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite l'appui financier de ALIDé. Célestine est mariée à un agent au Port nommé Gérôme et a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés. Parmi les enfants, seulement un est encore à la charge du couple. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Célestine et son mari habitent ensemble avec leur enfant. Célestine n’est jamais allée à l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Célestine mène comme activité depuis trente ans environs, la vente de condiments et de vivres à son domicile. Célestine s'approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle, Célestine sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON GBE. Leur ambition est d’accroître le niveau de leur activité.
texts.en:
The group NONVIGNON GBE is composed of 27 members who know each other because they live in the same district in Benin. The president of this group, by the name of Célestine, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. With the goal of boosting their businesses in order to cope better with customer demands, the group members are requesting financial support from ALIDé.  

Célestine is married to a Port agent named Gérôme and has five children, who are all in school. Only one of the children is still a dependent. The couple jointly ensures that the various family expenses are met. Célestine and her husband live together with their child. 

Célestine never went to school. To support herself and her family, she has been running a business for 30 years selling condiments and staple foods out of her home. She gets her supplies in Benin. 

With the goal of bolstering her business and further satisfying her customers, Célestine and the other members of the group NONVIGNON GBE are requesting a second loan from ALIDé. Their ambition is to grow their businesses.

loans.use: to buy condiments and staple foods

loans.name: Mirna Yaneth

texts.es: Mirna Yaneth de treinta y seis años de edad, madre soltera que vive con su hijo, dentro del casco urbano de la ciudad, ella posee una venta de tacos en el mercado local del lugar donde reside,  además cuando no son muy buenas las ventas comercia de manera ambulante, cuando sale lo hace por las tardes, vendiendo tacos de res, cerdo y pollo, tortas de jamon, pollo y res, acompañados de alguna salsa picante que adereza perfecto, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues los tacos tienen un sabor inigualable además a un precio accesible y Mirna les da un servicio excelente;  la demanda de sus ricos tacos se ha hecho más grande; Mirna quiere ver su negocio crecer es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima como: maíz, carne, tomates, condimentos, entre otros. Mirna Yaneth tiene la confianza que su esfuerzo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y seguridad económica.
texts.en: Mirna Yaneth, 36, is a single mother who lives with her son in the city center. She sells tacos in the market near where she lives, and when sales aren't very good she also sells them in the streets in the afternoons. She sells beef, pork and chicken tacos as well as ham, chicken and beef sandwiches accompanied by hot sauce that dresses it perfectly. She has a lot of customers because the tacos have unrivaled flavor and an affordable price, and Mirna gives excellent service. The demand for her delicious tacos has grown, and Mirna wants to see her business grow with it. For that reason, she has decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy more of the ingredients like corn, meat, tomatoes, condiments and other things. Mirna Yaneth is certain that her efforts will grant her the opportunity to give her family a better quality of life and financial security.

loans.use: to buy corn, meat, tomatoes and condiments.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen  de cincuenta y cinco años de edad, habita en su casa con su esposo Roberto de 48 años de edad y su hija de 17 años la cual se encuentra estudiando. Carmen posee una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia, la cual ha logrado mantener activa gracias a su trabajo y dedicación en la misma. Para ella lo más importante son sus clientes razón por la cual siempre trata de atenderlos con una sonrisa y con mucha  amabilidad.  Su sueño es ver su negocio florecer en donde muchas personas la visiten y siempre encuentren lo que buscan es decir poder satisfacer a una mayor demanda. Todo esto con el fin de aumentar su nivel de ventas y de ingresos para poder dar a su familia una realidad diferente. Esto la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el objetivo de invertir en la compra de más artículos de tienda como: aceite, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, golosinas, detergente, pan dulce, etc. que le permitan lograr su sueño. Tiene plena confianza que logrará buenos resultados que le permitirán accesar a la calidad de vida que ella desea.
texts.en: Carmen, 55, lives with her husband Roberto, 48, and her 17 year old daughter who is in school. Carmen has a small store in her home, which has stayed open thanks to her work and dedication. For her the customers come first, which is why she always tries to take care of them with a smile and a friendly attitude. Her dream is to see her business flourish to where she has a lot of customers and they always find what they are looking for. She would like to be able to satisfy a larger demand in order to increase her sales and income so that she can give her family a different reality. This has motivated her to request a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of items for her store like oil, rice, beans, sugar, snacks, detergent, sweet rolls, etc that will help her achieve her dream. She has full confidence that she will get good results that will allow her to reach the quality of life that she wants.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar, snacks, detergent, sweet rolls, etc.

loans.name: Telma Elizabeth

texts.es: Telma Elizabeth de veinte y seis años de edad, habita en casa propia con su esposo quien es empleado y su querida hija. Ella es una mujer emprendedora la cual trabaja duramente para colaborar con los ingresos del hogar ayudando a su esposo y poder sacar adelante a su familia. Telma posee una pequeña tienda en la cual vende granos básicos y bebidas. Además posee una tortillería en la cual trabaja constantemente para tener listas las ricas tortillas que son demandadas para el almuerzo y cena. Sueña con dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, pero para  esto necesita un poco mas de dinero y la única forma de tenerlo es trabajando duramente. Esto es lo que la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de abastecerlo y poder satisfacer a una mayor demanda. Con el crédito piensa comprar artículos como: arroz, frijoles, maíz, bebidas, gas propano, etc. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño y dar a su familia todo lo que necesite.
texts.en: Telma Elizabeth, 27, lives in her own home with her husband, who is employed, and her darling daughter. She is an enterprising woman who works hard to contribute to the income for their home, helping her husband and being able to get her family ahead. Telma has a small store where she sells basic goods and sodas. She also sells tortillas and works constantly to always have her delicious tortillas ready, which are in great demand at lunch and dinner time. She dreams of giving her family a better quality of life, but for that she needs a little bit more money and the only way to get it is to work hard. This is what has motivated her to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can stock her store and satisfy a greater demand. With the loan she will buy things like rice, beans, corn, drinks, propane gas, etc. This is how she hopes to achieve her dream and give her family everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy items like rice, beans, corn, drinks, propane, etc.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia  habita en su casa con su esposo y dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta D. pollos desD. hace varios años. Este negocio y la agricultura son sus principales fuentes D. ingresos por lo que lucha día con día para que este no muera y pueda seguir recibiendo los buenos beneficios que hasta el momento le ha sabido dar. Es muy conocida en la zona donD. resiD. ya que las personas le tienen confianza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y sobre todo justa. En el negocio D. Antonia siempre se encuentran los mejores pollos a los mejores precios. Últimamente la demanda D. sus pollos ha aumentado y muchas veces queda desabastecida ya que no cuenta con muchos pollos para la venta. Esta es la razón que la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar más pollos que le permitan cubrir toda la demanda y satisfacer a todos sus clientes. D. esta manera también espera mejorar sus ingresos para poder dar a su querida familia una calidad D. vida diferente.
texts.en: Antonia lives in her home with her husband and two children.  She has been raising and selling chickens for several years.  This business and farming are her main sources of income and, for this reason, she works hard every day so that her business is able to keep going and she is able to continue making the good profits that she has maD. up to now.  Antonia is very well known in the area where she lives.  People trust her because she is a hard-working, responsible and, above all, fair woman.  Antonia's business always offers the best chickens at the best prices.  Recently, demand for her chickens has increased and she often finds herself out of stock as she doesn't have many chickens to sell.  This is the reason that motivated her to request this loan from INTEGRAL, so that she could buy more chickens which would allow her to meet her demand and satisfy all her customers.  In this way, she also hopes to improve her income so that she can proviD. her beloved family with a different quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Cecilia Del Carmen

texts.es: Cecilia del Carmen D. cuarenta y dos años D. edad, habita en casa familiar junto con su esposo Víctor, dos hijas y un hijo. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora.  Se dedica a la venta D. artículos D. belleza para dama tales como: ganchos para el cabello, diademas, colas, etc. Su venta la realiza D. manera ambulante en los principales lugares D. la zona como el mercado municipal y las tiendas cercanas a su hogar D. residencia. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que ella siempre trata D. tener variedad en su mercadería y sobre todo precios accesibles. Además gracias a su carisma y amabilidad las personas la prefieren ya que ella siempre realiza su trabajo con mucho entusiasmo y dedicación. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. artículos D. belleza para dama D. tal manera que le permitan estar un paso delante D. la competencia. Los principales artículos en los cuales piensa invertir su crédito son: variedad D. ganchos para el cabello, variedad D. colas, diademas, aretes y otros productos que resulten llamativos para los clientes y que se encuentren en el mundo D. la moda. Espera tener éxito en esta decisión y lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
42-year-old Cecilia del Carmen lives in her family home together with her husband Víctor, two daughters and one son.  She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who sells ladies' beauty accessories such as hairpins, hairbands, hair clips, etc.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor in the main places in her area such as the town market and the stores near her home.  She has many customers as she always tries to have a variety of merchandise available at affordable prices.  Thanks to her charisma and kindness, people prefer to buy from her.  She always carries out her work with a lot of enthusiasm and commitment.

Cecilia has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy a range of ladies' beauty accessories and take a step ahead of the competition.  The main items in which she is planning to invest her loan are: a range of hairpins, clips, bands, earrings and other products that are attractive to her customers and are to be found in the world of fashion.  She hopes that this decision will be successful and that she will achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy a variety of hairpins, hair clips, hairbands, earrings, etc.

loans.name: Ayidote Group

texts.fr: AYIDOTE est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres habitent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe Bofè Rose (qui a la main levée sur la photo)  est âgée de 43 ans. Bofè Rose est mariée à un certain Isaac. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Bofè Rose et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs trois enfants et assurent ensemble leurs différentes charges. Bofè Rose a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Il y a une quinzaine d'année que Bofè Rose mène comme activité la vente de yaourt et des jus de fruits à son domicile. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant ainsi à contribuer aux charges familiales. Bofè Rose s'approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but d'améliorer le niveau de son activité en la  renforçant, et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Bofè Rose désire obtenir un deuxième financement, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE.
texts.en:
AYIDOTE is a group composed of five persons whose members live in the same district in Benin. The group's representative is Bofè Rose (with her hand raised in the photo). She is 43 years old and married to a man named Isaac. They have three children, all in school. Bofè Rose and her husband live together with their three children and jointly ensure that their different expenses are covered. 

Bofè Rose dropped out of middle school. For fifteen years, she has been running a business selling yoghurt and fruit juices out of her home. This business generates the revenues helping her to do her part in meeting family expenses. She gets her supplies in Benin. 

With the goal of improving her level of business by strengthening it, as well as satisfying customer demand, Bofè Rose and the other members of the group AYIDOTE would like to obtain a second loan.

loans.use: To buy hibiscus leaves, syrups, and sugar

loans.name: María Julia Dinora

texts.es: María Julia, madre soltera, reside  en casa propia con su querida hija de 16 años la cual se encuentra estudiando 2° año de bachillerato. Ella se dedica a la venta de  bonitos juguetes para todos los gustos y preferencias. Su venta la hace de manera ambulante en las principales plazas y escuelas de los alrededores del lugar donde ella habita. Su deseo es poder ver a su hija convertida en una profesional y esto es lo que la motiva a trabajar día a día. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con el fin de comprar variedad de juguetes que sean atractivos para los clientes y que le permitan atraer nueva clientela. Tiene la esperanza que de esta manera su situación mejorará y logrará alcanzar su sueño.
texts.en: María Julia is a single mother who lives in her own home together with her beloved 16-year-old daughter who is in her second year of high school.  María Julia sells toys to suit all tastes and preferences.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor in the main squares and schools in the area where she lives. Her wish is to be able to see her daughter become a professional.  This is what motivates her to work every day.  She has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy a variety of toys that will appeal to her customers and allow her to attract new customers.  She hopes that this will improve her situation and that she will manage to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy a variety of toys

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es: María Concepción de 45 años de edad, habita en su propia casa junto con su compañero de vida y cuatro hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio desde hace ya varios años. Posee una tienda en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad y a la vez se dedica a la venta de deliciosas tortillas. Sin duda alguna, es una mujer emprendedora la cual hace todo por sacar adelante a su querida familia. Para María lo más importante es su familia y es la que la inspira  a trabajar duramente día con día. Su sueño es satisfacer a una mayor demanda la cual le permita aumentar su nivel de ventas y por consecuencia su nivel de ingresos que le permita tener acceso a una mejor calidad de vida. Todo esto la ha inspirado a tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en lo necesario para su negocio. Es decir, con el crédito desea comprar: granos básicos, bebidas, gas propano, agua, etc. De tal manera que  su tienda y tortillería florezcan cada día más.
texts.en: Maria Concepción is 45 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and 4 children. She has been in business for many years. She owns a store where she sells staples and also delicious tortillas. Without doubt, she is an enterprising woman who does everything in her power to give her family a good start in life. For Maria, the most important thing in her life is her family and they inspire her to work hard every day. Her dream is to satisfy the increased demand for her products which in turn would allow her to increase her sales and consequently her income thus improving her quality of life. This dream has prompted her to ask for a loan with INTEGRAL to buy what she needs for her business. That is to say, with the loan she wants to buy basic grains, beverages, propane gas, water and the like. In this way, her store and tortilla making business will flourish.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, beverages, propane gas, water and the like.

loans.name: Miriam Lizeth

texts.es: Miriam Lizeth tiene 35 años de edad y es madre soltera de dos hijas, y junto a ellas reside en el Barrio El Centro del Municipio de Patuca. Actualmente Mirian se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado y sus hijas a estudiar. Miriam inició a realizar la actividad de la ganaderia hace varios años atrás pero no lo hacia sola sino que con otras personas que en sociedad aportaban dinero para la compra del ganado. Luego de un tiempo decidió independizarse e iba comprando ganado de uno en uno, hasta que logró tener su buen hato ganadero y hasta compró su propio camión para transportar el ganado una vez que lo vende. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar varias vacas y un toro. Con el apoyo de este prestamo espera obtener mejores ganancias y seguir apoyando a sus hijas con el estudio y con su sustento diario. Actualmente Miriam tiene tres ciclos en FAMA y ha pagado sus cuotas de manera puntual. Su meta es ser una de las mayores ganaderas de la region y con el transcurso de los años llegar a tener una planta procesadora de carnes.
texts.en: Miriam Lizeth is 35 years old and a single mother of two daughters. She lives with them in the El Centro neighborhood in the town of Patuca. Miriam buys and sells cattle and her daughters go to school. Miriam started this cattle activity several years ago but she didn't do it alone, buy with other people who would contribute money to buy the cattle. Later she decided to go it on her own and she would buy cattle one by one until she had a good herd of cattle and was even able to buy her own truck to transport the cattle to be sold. She is asking for the loan to buy several cows and a bull. With the support of this loan, she hopes to obtain better earnings and keep supporting her daughters with their schooling and daily expenses. Miriam has been in FAMA for three cycles and has made her payments on time. Her goal is to be one of the best cattle ranchers in the area and in a few years have her own meat processing plant.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, snacks, milk, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: 13 De Junio Group

texts.es:
13 de Junio es denominado el comité de la ciudad de Curuguaty, está integrado por 10 mujeres de esa ciudad. Dicho grupo se forma a iniciativa de una de las miembros del grupo, la cual oyó hablar del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya y organizó a sus amigas y vecinas y de allí surge el grupo. Ellas se definen como mujeres trabajadoras, luchadoras y muy sacrificadas, que día a día luchan por salir adelante y generar ingresos para sus hijos y familiares.
La señora Luciana se dedica a la venta de ropas, este trabajo la ha ayudado con todo los gastos que surgen día a día. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes que siempre compran de ella sus prendas. Uno de sus proyectos es poder traer más ropas y expandirse a zonas aledañas. Todo lo que hace es por darle un mejor futuro a sus familiares que de ella dependen.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, con lo cual podrá hacer frente a la demanda que tiene de sus clientes. Sabe que el crédito la ayudará mucho, por lo cual tiene muchas esperanzas en el.
texts.en:
The communal bank "13 de Junio"  is located in the city of Curuguaty and is comprised of 10 local women. The group was formed due to the initiative of one of the group members, who heard about Fundación Paraguaya's program for enterprising women. She then organized her friends and neighbors to form the group. They define themselves as hardworking, tenacious, and very sacrificed women that strive to get ahead every day in an effort to generate income for their children and family members.

Luciana sells clothes, which has helped her with all of the daily expenses. She told us that she has many clients that always buy their clothing from her. One of her projects is to acquire more clothing and expand to the neighboring areas. Everything that she does is to give a better future to the family members that are dependent on her. 

She is requesting this loan to buy winter clothing, with which she will be able to meet her clients' demands. She knows that this loan will help her greatly, which is why she is very hopeful for it.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Brenda Verónica

texts.es: Brenda Verónica de veinte y cinco años de edad, habita en casa familiar con su madre y una hermana en zona urbana del país. Ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que no deja pasar ninguna oportunidad de negocio. Brenda posee un pequeño negocio el cual consiste en un car wash que desde hace varios años le ha ayudado para poder dar a su familia un poco de ingresos para el sostenimiento del hogar. Ella es de la idea que la única forma de salir adelante y aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida es trabajando duramente, y eso es lo que hace cada día desde muy temprano. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio, con el fin de hacerlo crecer y verlo florecer en el futuro. El crédito solicitado lo necesita para comprar accesorios y una maquina de presión de agua y aspirado de carpetas o alfombras que le permitan hacer más rápido su trabajo y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. De esta manera espera tener la oportunidad de accesar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Brenda Verónica, age 25, lives in the family home with her mother and sister.  They live in an urban zone in the country.  She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who does not pass up any business opportunity.

Brenda has a small business, a car wash.  For several years it has helped her be able to give her family a little income to support the household.  She believes that the only way to get ahead and to pursue a better quality of life is by working hard.  That is what she does starting very early every day.

She has made the decision to request this loan from Integral in order to invest in her business so that it will grow and to see it flourish.  She needs the requested loan to buy accessories, a water pressure machine, and a carpet vacuum; which will allow her to do her work more quickly and to give her customers better service.  This is the way she hopes to have the opportunity to access a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy accessories and a machine to wash cars.

loans.name: Ernesto Antonio

texts.es: Ernesto Antonio de 43 años de edad, habita en su casa con su esposa y tres hijas las cuales por el momento se encuentran estudiando. Ernesto es un hombre trabajador el cual no se cansa de luchar día con día por el bienestar de su familia. Su principal inspiración son sus hijas las cuales lo motivan a trabajar duramente para darles una calidad de vida diferente. El se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos en el tiangue (plaza de compra y venta de animales) de su localidad.  El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su hogar de habitación y es uno de sus principales fuentes de ingresos. Es una persona muy reconocida en la zona ya que gracias a su carisma ha logrado ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Además, cuando de cerdos se trata él es que tiene los mejores tanto en calidad como en precios. Ernesto solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio ya que se ha visto en la necesidad de hacer  algunos arreglos en los corrales en donde mantiene a los cerdos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más cerdos y materiales para el mejoramiento del corral. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que logrará tener buenos resultados a partir de esta decisión y podrá alcanzar el sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ernesto Antonio, age 43, lives in a house with his wife and three daughters.  His daughters are currently in school.  Ernesto is a hard-working man who does not tire from struggling every day for his family’s well-being.  His daughters are his primary motivation; they motivate him to work hard in order to give them a different quality of life.

He raises and sells pigs in El Tiangue (plaza for buying and selling animals), which is in his area.  He has his business at home.  It is one of his main sources of income.  He is a well-known person in the zone because, thanks to his charisma, he has managed to earn his customers’ trust.  Also, when it comes to pigs he is the one who has the best quality and the best prices.

Ernesto requests this loan from Integral to invest in his business.  He has seen the need to make some repairs to the pens where he keeps the pigs.  He will use the loan to buy more pigs and materials for improving the pen.  He trusts in God and that he will achieve good results in his business by making this decision.  He also expects to be able to fulfill his dream of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and construction materials.

loans.name: Sebastiana Eloísa

texts.es: Sebastiana Eloísa D. cincuenta y un años D. edad, resiD. en casa propia en zona rural del país, con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Para Sebastiana su familia lo es todo y es la razón por la cual trabaja duramente para poder darles el pan D. cada día. DesD. hace diez años que se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad como: granos básicos, café, pan dulce, detergente, leche, gas propano, etc. en su pequeña tiendita que posee en su hogar D. residencia. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que por su amabilidad y dedicación en su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza D. todos sus vecinos. Además, cuenta con la ventaja D. que en  su comunidad no tiene competencia, esto la hace la líder en tiendas D. la zona donD. habita. Su deseo es surtir su negocio para tener todo lo que el cliente solicite a la hora D. hacer su compra. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito para comprar productos D. tienda al por mayor como: granos básicos, detergente, golosinas, aceite, café, gas propano, pan dulce, etc. con el fin D. mejorar su negocio y verlo florecer D. tal forma que le permitan mejorar sus ingresos y así poder tener acceso a una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Sebastiana Eloísa, age 50, lives in her own house in one of the country’s rural zones.  She lives with her husband and their four children, who are in school.  Her family is everything to Sebastiana, and that is the reason the she works hard in order to be able to give them their daily bread.

For ten years she has been selling basic needs products like basic grains, coffee, sweet rolls, detergent, milk, and propane gas, etc.  She sells from her small store, which is in her house.    She has a lot of customers due to her affability and dedication to her work.   She has known how to win the trust of all of her neighbors.  Also, she has the advantage of having no competition in her community.  This makes her the leader of stores in the zone where she lives.

Her wish is to stock her business in order to have everything that the customers request when they make their purchases.  This is the reason she is requesting this loan in order to buy wholesale products for her store.  She will buy things like basic grains, detergent, sweets, oil, coffee, and propane gas, etc.  She will do this in order to improve her business and to see it flourish in such a way that allows her to improve her income.  That way she will be able to have access to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, sweets, oil, coffee, and propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Doña Maria es comerciante desde hace once años, puso una pulperia, en el cual ha venido introduciendo mas productos de variedad, para obtener mejores ventas. al iniciar lo hizo con dinero ahorrado. 
Es madre de tres hijos, el cual ha tenido que apoyarlos en sus estudios, ya que no cuenta con la ayuda del padre. Es dificil, pero uno tiene que aprender a salir adelante por su familia.
Maria lleva varios prestamos en Afodenic, el cual ha sido para ella, de gran sastifaccion, ya que ha logrado, el equilibrio en sus ventas, captacion de sus clientes.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo invertira en la compra de productos para seguir aumentando las ventas, en la compra de granos basicos, productos de la coca cola, golosinas, pollo, carne, productos lacteos entre otros.
texts.en:
Maria has been a merchant for 11 years, having established a general store in which she continues to introduce a great variety of products, hoping for better sales. At the outset, she did this with money she had saved.

Maria is the mother of 3 children and she has had to pay for their studies, since she can't count on assistance from their father. It is difficult but one has to learn how to forge ahead for the family.

Maria has received various loans with Afodenic, a great satisfaction for her, since she has achieved equilibrium in sales and has acquired steady customers.

Today, with this new loan, Maria will invest in new products to continue augmenting sales – items such as basic grains, Coca Cola products, sweets, chicken, meat, and dairy products among others.

loans.use: invest in products that increase sales, buying basic grains, dairy products, meat, and chicken -- items most in demand by customers.

loans.name: María Marleny

texts.es: María Marleny de veinticuatro años de edad habita en casa familiar con su madre y dos pequeñas hijas de 8 y 2 años de edad.  María es una mujer emprendedora  con muchas metas e ideas de negocio. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña  tienda que  ha logrado establecer en su hogar de residencia. Su principal inspiración es su familia ya que su sueño es poder dar a sus hijas el estudio para que un día puedan convertirse en  grandes profesionales y tengan la oportunidad de una mejor calidad de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio y comprar mercadería al por mayor para surtir su tienda de tal manera que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. Con el crédito tiene pensado comprar artículos como: azúcar, frijoles, arroz, detergente, aceite, golosinas, huevos, y de mas artículos que permitan atraer a mas clientes. Es una mujer con mucha fe y sabe que de esta manera logrará subir su nivel de ventas así como su nivel de ingresos que le permitan accesar a una mejora calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 24 years old and lives in her family home with her mother and 2 daughters, aged 8 and 2. She is an enterprising woman with many goals and business ideas. Maria sells products of primary necessity in a little store which she managed to establish in her place of residence.

Maria's principal inspiration is her family. Her dream is to be able to provide her daughters with schooling so that one day they can become great professionals and have the opportunity for a better quality of life.

Maria has decided to solicit a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in her business, buying merchandise at wholesale to restock her store, so that customers will always encounter what they are looking for.

With this loan, Maria intends to buy articles such as sugar, beans, rice, detergent, cooking oil, cookies, eggs, and other articles that will permit her to attract more customers. Maria is a woman with much faith and she knows that in this way, she will manage to increase sales and income, allowing her to achieve a higher quality of life.

loans.use: buy articles such as sugar, beans, rice, detergent, cooking oil, cookies, eggs, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина замужем. Она живет в городе Никополь, где имеет свой бизнес. Ирина торгует женской спортивной одеждой: куртки, ветровки, спортивные костюмы, шорты, футболки, кепки и т.д. Ежемесячный оборот составляет 32,000 гривен. Данный бизнес – единственный источник дохода для семьи Ирины.

Ирина занимается этим бизнесом уже 5 лет. Она вовремя увидела малую перспективность торговли просто на рынке в палатке и поэтому перенесла торговлю в магазин, где товар не затаскивается и не пылиться. Есть больше возможности уделить внимание каждому покупателю. 

Ирина трудолюбивая и прилежная. Она не ленится еженедельно ездить за товар и не жалеет средств привозить что-то новое. Она просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен для закупки спортивных костюмов, шорт и сумок.
texts.en: Irina is married. She lives in the city of Nikopol, where she has her own business. Irina sells women's sports clothes: jackets, windbreakers, tracksuits, shorts, t-shirts, hats, etc. Every month her turnover is 32,000 hryvnia. This business is the only source of income for Irina's family. She has been in business 5 years. In no time, she saw little promise in only selling at a stall in the market and transferred her business to a store, where her goods do not wear out or get dusty. There are more opportunities there to pay attention to each customer. Irina is hardworking and diligent. She does not neglect to go get her goods every week and spares no expense in bringing in something new. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 hyvnia to buy tracksuits, shorts and bags.

loans.use: Purchase tracksuits, shorts and bags

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: Nelson Antonio de treinta y un años de edad, reside en casa familiar junto con su compañera de vida y dos hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Nelson se dedica  a la venta de juegos de video. Su negocio lo tiene en su hogar de residencia y gracias a su amabilidad, creatividad y a la gran variedad de productos que mantiene ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes los cuales lo prefieren por ser un hombre responsable, trabajador y dedicado en su negocio. Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar mayor variedad de juegos de video y poder surtir su negocio de tal manera que logre atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar su nivel de ventas así como su nivel de ingresos para poder accesar a una mejor calidad de vida. Es importante recalcar que anteriormente ya había tenido crédito con INTEGRAL y se clasifica como un cliente responsable y agradecido por la ayuda que se le brindó.
texts.en: Nelson Antonio, 31, lives in his family home with his life partner and 2 children who are in school.  Nelson has a business selling video games which is located in his home.  Thanks to his friendliness and creativity, and his large inventory of products, he has managed to gain the trust of many customers.  They prefer his business because he is a responsible and hardworking man who is devoted to his business.  He has decided to use this loan from INTEGRAL to buy a large variety of video games so that he can stock his business in such a way that he will attract more customers.  This will allow him to increase his sales and also his income, enabling him to have a better quality of life.  It is important to emphasize that previously he had taken a loan from INTEGRAL, and they have characterized him as a responsible client who is grateful for the help that was provided.

loans.use: to buy a variety of video games

loans.name: Yanira Elizabeth

texts.es: Yanira Elizabeth de treinta y un años de edad, reside en su casa con su compañero de vida y su hija de once años de edad. Yanira es una mujer increíble la cual no pierde oportunidad para hacer negocio. Ella se dedica a la venta de calzado. Posee un pequeño puesto en el mercado central de la zona donde ella habita. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica ya que se encuentra ubicado en las principales calles del lugar. Además, cuenta con clientela fija ya que por su amabilidad ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. Anteriormente recibió crédito de INTEGRAL para invertirlo en su negocio y gracias a esto ha podido mantenerse un paso adelante de la competencia. Es muy responsable y desea poder obtener un nuevo crédito que le permita surtir  su negocio con nueva mercadería de tal manera que le permita atraer a mas clientes demandantes de sus productos. Con el crédito piensa comprar variedad de sandalias para todo género, edad y preferencias.  Confía en Dios que logrará su sueño y podrá dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Yanira Elizabeth, 31, lives in her house with her life partner and their 11 year-old daughter.  Yanira is an amazing woman who never misses an opportunity to do business.  She has a business selling shoes.  She has a small post in the central market in the neighborhood where she lives.  The location of her business is very strategic, since it is located on one of the main streets in the place.  In addition, she has regular customers, because  due to her friendly demeanor, she has known how to gain the trust of many people.  She previously received a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, and thanks to that she has been able to stay one step ahead of the competition.  She is very responsible, and she wants to take a new loan so that she can stock her business with new merchandise.  This way she can attract more customers to purchase her products.  With the loan, she is planning to buy a variety of sandals for all genders, ages and tastes.  She trusts in God that she will achieve her dream so that she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sandals for all genders, ages and tastes

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario del Carmen de 45 años de edad, reside en casa propia en zona urbana con su esposo de 44 años, su hijo y su nieto. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricas pupusas. Día a día se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado y tener frescos y listos los ingredientes que le permiten hacer sus deliciosas pupusas. Tiene mucha clientela ya que cuando de pupusas se trata ella tiene las mejores y con los precios más accesibles, a base de maiz y arroz de chicharron, frijoles, queso y revueltas (todos los ingredientes). Ha decidido hacer este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio ya que su sueño es verlo crecer de manera que pueda así mejorar su calidad de vida. Piensa invertir en la materia prima necesaria como: maíz, arroz, chicharon, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. de esta manera espera lograr su sueño y poder dar a su familia una mejor oportunidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosario de Carmen, age 45, lives in her own house in an urban zone.  She lives with her 44 year old husband, her son, and her grandson.

She makes and sells delicious “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans).  She gets up early every day to go to the market.  She does this in order to have ready the fresh ingredients that allow her to make her delicious pupusas.  She has a lot of customers because, when it comes to pupusas, she has the best, and she has the most accessible prices.  They are made from a base of corn and “chicharron” (fried pork rinds) and stuffed with rice, beans, and cheese (all of the ingredients).

She has decided to get this loan from Integral in order to invest in her business.  Her dream is to see it grow in a way that she will be able to improve her quality of life.  She plans to invest in the ingredients she needs like corn, rice, chicharon, cheese, beans, tomatoes, and cabbage.  This way she hopes to manage to fulfill her dream and to be able to give her family an improved opportunity in life.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, chicharon, cheese, beans, tomatoes, and cabbage.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase pigs.

loans.name: Rhina Jaqueline

texts.es: La Sra. Rhina se dedica a la confección de ropa interior de bautizo para niñas;  indica que  tiene experiencia de 10 años en esta actividad su taller se encuentra en su domicilio donde realiza los trabajos a pedido como también para comercializarlos en los distintos Mercados de la ciudad de La Paz viaja los fines de semana y es en la madrugada donde realiza las ventas en docenas y por mayor; vive en casa propia su domicilio se encuentra en el sud de la ciudad de Cochabamba es una zona alejada, tiene 1 hijo su esposo se encuentra enfermo con diabetes en etapa terminal por lo que ella es la única que con su actividad genera ingresos para su familia; indica que el dinero que se le otorga es para la compra de una maquina para costura industrial que le permitirá realizar la confección con mas eficiencia y mejor calidad, es una persona muy trabajadora.
texts.en:
Ms. Rhina devotes herself to creating baptismal undergarments for girls. She indicates that she has ten years of experience in this business. Her workshop is in her home, where she does her work filling special orders as well as for selling in the market districts of the city of La Paz. She travels on weekends and in the early morning hours makes her sales by the dozens or wholesale. 

She lives in her own home. Her household is located in the southern part of the city of Cochabamba which is a remote area. She has one child. Her husband is ill from terminal-stage diabetes and so she is the only one who, with her business, generates income for her family. 

She indicates that the money being granted her is for the purchase of an industrial sewing machine which will allow her to sew her products more efficiently and at higher quality. She is a very hardworking person.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for his general store.

loans.name: La Bendicion 1 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Altagracia is the coordinator of her group "La Bendicion" (Blessing) 1 & 4. She makes her home here in a simple house with her long-time partner. She says that her most difficult challenge is to raise and provide for her family. Her two children are grown. She plans to continue enjoying working most of the time.

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed to start up a business. Later, she met some neighbors to form a group in her community and start getting loans to do business and make changes in their lives.  She has had her business for over six years, starting after the first loan she received from Esperanza. 

Her group is located in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area.

Altagracia is excited to be taking out her 11th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying pants, shirts, underwear and shoes. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and to save.

Her dream is to live safely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Silvia Eugenia

texts.es: La señora Silvia es una socia nueva, La señora es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora, Casada con 2 hijos en edad escolar, Actualmente se encuentra viviendo en alquiler junto con sus hijos y su esposo quien es chofer con vehículo propio. La cliente tiene como actividad principal la venta de cosméticos de forma ambulante y por catalogo ya hace bastante tiempo, ella ofrece sus productos por la zona visitando casas,  oficinas el destino del crédito lo invertirá en el aumento de capital de trabajo comprando cosméticos por mayor y que se encuentren en promoción y poder venderlos obteniendo mas ganancia y así mejorar su actividad económica.
texts.en:
Ms. Silvia is a new member. She is a hardworking and enterprising person, married with two school-aged children. Currently she rents the place where she lives along with her children and husband, who is a driver with his own vehicle. As her primary business activity the member sells cosmetics door-to-door and by catalog, which she has done for quite some time. She offers her products around the area visiting homes and offices. 

As for the purpose of the loan, she will invest it to increase working capital, buying cosmetics wholesale and that may be in promotion, so she can sell them for greater profit and thus improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics wholesale.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Ocongate, en la Provincia de Quispicanchis y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio David tiene 26 años de edad,  el socio es casado; el socio tiene 1 hijo, el socio trabaja como maestro de obra y también en el oficio de peón;  el socio desea en esta ocasión comprar un pequeño terreno para construir su casita, el socio sueña con dar a su familia una muy buena calidad de vida y poder pagar los estudios de la universidad a futuro de sus hijo, el socio es un señor muy trabajador y siempre esta tras de las diferentes obras en la municipalidad del poblado y las obras particulares, para emplearse, el socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un terreno para construir su casa.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Las Margaritas de Ocongate, located in the district of Ocongate in the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco. 

The member David is 26 years old, married and has one child. The member works as a master builder and also as a laborer. The member on this occasion wishes to purchase a small plot of land for building a small house. The member dreams of being able to give his family a very good quality of life, and of being able to pay for future costs of a university for his child. The member is a very hardworking man and stays constantly in touch with the various construction projects going on in the municipality, as well as the private constructions projects, for his employment. The member is seeking the loan to invest in the purchase of a plot of land for building his house. 

The member appreciates the support which is granted him and thus commits to making his payments in a disciplined fashion.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of land for building his home.

loans.name: La Bendicion 3-5 Group

texts.en:
Luisa is the coordinator of her group La Bendicion (Blessing) 3 & 5. Her group is located in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area.

She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. 

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed to start a business since the income from her husband was not enough. She found a way to help him by bringing in extra incoming through selling used clothes. She has had her business for over four years, starting with her first Esperanza  loan. 

This is Luisa´s eighth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business.

She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying a bag of used clothing and some new pieces specially for men. She will use the profits to buy more bags and improve her business. She is also planning to save and buy a house to live in with her family so she can stop paying rent. This is her most difficult challenge and also one of her dreams. She enjoys being at her home with her children and her partner.

Luisa is thankful for all your support!

loans.use: to buy a bag of used clothes and also some new clothes to resell.

loans.name: Ubaldo

texts.es: Don Ubaldo tiene 52 años de edad, es casado y tiene una hija mujer y un hijo varon, y junto a ellos reside en la Comunidad de Las Vegas en el Municipio de Trojes. Don Ubaldo y su familia se dedican al cultivo de café, tambien poseen una pequeña pulperia y en pequeña escala al cultivo de plátano y maiz. Èl es un señor humilde y muy trabajador. Inició a sembrar café hace 12 años, y lo aprendió por su familia, tiene algunos trabajadores que le ayudan con las labores de la finca y él y su hijo tambien se suman a las tareas. Su horario de trabajo inicia a las 6:00 am y finaliza a las 12:00 pm. La ventaja del cultivo de café es que es un producto básico de exportación y muy importante en el país. La desventaja es que en muchas ocasiones Don Ubaldo no ha vendido su producto al precio que deberia por el desmedido descontrol de intermediarios no legales que quieren comprar el producto a un precio super bajo y luego llevarselo a otros paises para venderlo hasta cinco veces mas caro de como lo compraron, tambien debe enfrentarse a que en tiempo de cosecha la mano de obra es escaza y eso le ha provocado algunas perdidas, pero con todo y eso Don Ubaldo siempre ha seguido adelante sin dejarse vencer. El prestamo que esta solicitando lo necesita para la fertilizacion y limpia de 6 mz de cultivo. Con el apoyo del prestamo su cultivo mejorara ya que la fertilizacion de la tierra se hará oportunamente y las condiciones de vida de su familia seran mejores. Don Ubaldo tiene dos ciclos en FAMA y no ha tenido atrasos en el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Don Ubaldo is 52 years old, married and has one daughter and one son. Together with them he resides in the Las Vegas community of the municipality of Trojes. Don Ubaldo and his family devote themselves to growing coffee, and also have a small grocery store, as well as growing bananas and corn on a small scale. He is a humble and very hardworking man. He began growing coffee 12 years ago and learned it from his family. He has some laborers who help him with the work on the farm, and he and his son also join in on the efforts. His work schedule begins at 6 a.m. and ends at 12 p.m. The advantage to coffee growing is that it is a primary product for exportation and very important to the country. The disadvantage is that often Don Ubaldo has not sold his product at the price he should have, because of the out-of-control actions of illegal middlemen who want to buy the product at a super low price and then take it to other countries, where they sell it for as much as five times more than they paid for it. 

He also must deal with the fact that at harvest time labor is scarce, and this has caused him some losses, but in spite of everything, Don Ubaldo has always kept going without giving up. He needs the loan he is seeking for fertilizing and clearing over ten acres of farmland. With the support of the loan he will improve his crops, since the fertilization of the soil will be done at an appropriate time, and his family's living conditions will be improved. Don Ubaldo has two cycles with FAMA and has not been behind on any of his payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for coffee farming.

loans.name: Iván Augusto

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive Don Iván, tiene 34 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos todos menores y estudian dos en colegio y el menor en  escuela. Su mujer se dedica al comercio. Lleva tres ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le agrada porque los intereses son  más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito.

El junto a su esposa se dedican al negocio de las comidas rápidas, todas las tardes ellos se desplazan hasta el centro de Montecristi en donde tienen una carreta donde preparan y venden deliciosas hamburguesas, hot dog, papas fritas, jugos, sodas y batidos de frutas, trabajan todos los días desde las 16h00 hasta las 22h00 y llevan en este negocio 10 años en los que les ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar sodas, cervezas y víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos.

Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nueva Ciudad Alfaro meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton, known for its rich precolonial culture and for its handicraft which is renowned nationally and internationally, the place of the famous Panama hats. 

In this place lives Don Iván, who is 34 and in a committed relationship by which he has three children, all of them minors who go to school, two in middle school and the youngest in elementary school. His partner devotes herself to business. He has three cycles in the communal bank and he likes it because the interest rates are lower than in other lending institutions. 

He along with his partner devotes himself to the fast food business. Every afternoon they go to downtown Montecristi where they have a cart where they prepare and sell delicious hamburgers, hot dogs, french fries, juices, sodas and fruit smoothies. They work every day from 4 p.m. until 10 p.m. and have had the business for ten years, during which time it has gone very well for them. 

This loan will used for purchasing sodas, beer, and the groceries he needs for preparing the foods. 

His dream is to have a large restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, beer and groceries.

loans.name: Mariana Concepción

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Mariana, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene una niña de 5 años que este año empezó la escuela, el marido es chofer profesional.

Ella es una muy buena  madre y esposa que para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio, vende ropa, zapatos y productos Avon, Esika (perfumes, cremas, bisutería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, la mayoría de sus ventas las realiza bajo pedido que le realizan sus clientes, ella además de vender en Montecristi también vende en la ciudad de Manta, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada fin de semana, la ropa y los zapatos los compra en Guayaquil cada vez que necesita, lleva cinco años dedicada a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, zapatos, perfumes, cremas,cosméticos y bisutería. Este es el cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque el grupo es bien unido.

Su sueño es tener un gran negocio.
texts.en:
The "Nueva Ciudad Alfaro" communal bank meets every 15 days in Montecristi canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts that are recognized at the national and international level.  Montecristi is where the famous toquilla straw hats are made (also known as Panama hats).

Mariana lives here. She is 32, married, and has a 5 year old little girl. Her husband is a professional driver.

She is a very good mother and wife, and to help her husband with the household expenses she  has a business. She sells clothing, shoes, as well as Avon and Esika products (perfumes, creams, costume jewellery, and ladies' accessories). 

She sells door-to-door. The majority of her sales are through orders placed by her customers. Besides selling in Montecristi, she also sells in the city of Manta. She sells her products on credit, and collects every weekend. She buys the clothing and shoes in Guayaquil whenever she needs to. She has worked in this business for 5 years, and it's going very well. 

She's going to use this loan to buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and costume jewellery. This is her fourth loan cycle with the communal bank, and she likes it because the group is really unified.  Her dream is to have a big business.

loans.use: To buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, creams, cosmetics and costume jewellery.

loans.name: Franklin

texts.es:
Don Franklin trabaja como cadete de taxi, desde hace once años, siendo propio su vehiculo, es casado, padre de tres hijos estudiantes, su esposa labora para en una empresa privada.
Ambos se apoyan para el bienestar comun de la familia, ademas del taxi, tiene la entrada de la barberia. Lo que se ayuda mucho. Y es atraves de Afodenic que ha mejorado al comprar herramientas para su trabajo.
Con este nuevo prestamo dara mantenimiento a su vehiculo en la parte de enfrente de la caroza que esta levantada, comprara dos focos, dos pide vias,un bigote, radiador completo. Lo que espera seguir trabajando en mejores condiciones
texts.en:
Don Franklin has worked as a taxi driver for eleven years, using his own vehicle. He is married and the father of three school-aged children. His wife works for a private company. They each do their part to support the common welfare of the family. In addition to the taxi he has income from the barber shop, which helps a lot. And, through Afodenic he has made improvements, buying tools for his work. 

With this new loan he will provide repairs to his vehicle to the area in front of the vehicle's cabin, which is raised up. He will purchase two bulbs, two turn signals, an air dam and an entire radiator. What he hopes for is to continue working under improved conditions.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle to improve his taxi services, which is his family's sustenance.

loans.name: Flerida Georgina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi , conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Flerida, tiene 63 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene siete hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. El marido es comerciante. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son muy importante para su negocio.

Ella junto a su esposo tienen un restaurante, allí todas las tardes venden gran variedad de platos para el gusto de sus clientes que acuden al lugar para darse gusto con los platos que prepara nuestra amiga. Trabajan todos los días desde las 16h00 hasta las 20h00, una señora le ayuda con su negocio al igual que su esposo. Lleva más de 30 años con su negocio y  le va muy bien ya que tiene muchos clientes.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar sodas, cervezas y víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos.

Sus sueños son seguir adelante y tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ciudad Alfaro” (New City of Alfaro) communal bank meets every fifteen days in Montecristi Canton known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are known nationally and internationally; it’s the place the famous straw hats come from.

Flerida, 63, lives here.  She’s married and has seven children who are all adults now but one still lives at home.  Her husband’s a merchant.  She’s been in the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans are very important for her business.

She and her husband have a restaurant.  They sell a great variety of dishes there in the evening for the pleasure of their customers who come there to enjoy the dishes our friend prepares.  They work daily from 4pm until 8pm.  Another lady helps her with the work as does her husband.  She’s been in business over 30 years and does very well because she has many customers.

She will use this loan to buy soft-drinks, beer and foodstuffs needed to prepare her meals.  Her dreams are to continue forward and to be in good health.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, beer and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha tiene 54 años es una mujer muy responsable y emprendedora. Esta separada de su esposo, viven en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos. Bertha tiene un trabajo muy interesante, su trabajo consiste en traer joyas de la ciudad de Lima y venderlos entre sus amigas y familiares, cuando no vende en su casa pues sale a la casa de sus amistades, lleva ya casi seis años en este negocio el cual hace sola y en algunas ocasiones le ayuda uno de sus hijos. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo para hacer otras actividades, además que en su negocio siempre hay cliente y por lo tanto siempre tiene ingresos, por el momento ella solo quiere mantener su negocio, pues el tiempo le alcanza para hacer las cosas que necesita y como es docente en una escuela no puede disponer de mas tiempo como para poder agrandar su negocio. Este es el préstamo número 12 con MFP, el grupo al que pertenece le gusta mucho y espera poder seguir trabajando con la institución ya que siente que le es de mucha ayuda. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 soles, comprará más joyas para poder seguir con este trabajo que le ayuda a poder cumplir siempre con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Bertha, 54, is a very responsible and enterprising woman. She is separated from her husband and lives in her own home along with her two children. Bertha does very interesting work. Her work consists of bringing jewelry from the city of Lima and selling it among her friends and family members. What she does not sell at home she goes out to her friends' homes to sell. She has been working in this business for almost six years. She works alone and occasionally one of her children helps her. 

What she most enjoys about her work is that it leaves her time to do other activities, and furthermore, there are always customers for her business so she always has an income. For the time being she only wishes to remain in the business, since she has plenty of time to do the things she needs to do, and as she is an elementary school teacher she does not have more time in order to be able to expand her business. 

This is the twelfth loan between the institution MFP and Bertha. She likes the group she belongs to very much and hopes to continue working with the institution, as she feels that it is a great help to her. With the amount of 1,000 she has sought, she will buy more jewelry so she may continue doing this work which helps her to make all her payments.

loans.use: to purchase more jewelry so she may continue doing this work which helps her to make all her payments.

loans.name: Angela Vanessa

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Angela, tiene 25 años  de edad, está soltera y estudia en el primer semestre de Ing. Comercial en la Universidad Laica de Manta. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva en el Banco Comunal ya por tres  ciclos y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ha podido empezar un negocio que le permite ganarse algo para sus estudios.

Es una chica muy trabajadora que además de estudiar en las mañanas le ayuda a sus padres en una tienda de víveres que ellos tienen, en las tardes y en este mismo lugar también se dedica a la venta de productos Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Tiene tres meses  que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien ya que también vende en la Universidad a sus compañeros de clases.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería.

Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y llegar a ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ciudad Alfaro” (New City of Alfaro) communal bank meets every fifteen days in Montecristi Canton known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are known nationally and internationally; it’s the place the famous straw hats come from.

Ángela, 25, lives here.  She’s single and is in the first semester of Commercial Engineering at Manta’s Universidad Laica.  She lives in her parents’ house.  She’s been in the communal bank for three cycles and she likes it because the loans have made it possible for her to start a business that allows her to earn a bit for her studies.

She is a very hardworking young woman who besides going to classes in the morning helps her parents in a grocery store they have.  During the afternoon she also sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women’s accessories) in the same place.  She sells on credit and collects payments weekly.  She’s been in this activity for three months and does very well since she also sells to her university classmates.

This loan is to buy perfume, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry.  Her dreams are to finish her studies and become a great businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Aquiles

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS MARGARITAS DE OCONGATE ” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Ocongate, en la Provincia de Quispicanchis y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio Aquiles tiene 35 años de edad,  el socio es casado; el socio tiene 4 hijos, el socio trabaja como maestro de construcción civil y el socio ahora está deseando invertir el crédito en la mejora de su vivienda, el socio también es peón en las diversas obras,  el socio requiere el crédito para mejorar su vivienda, el invertirá el dinero en la compra de cemento, arena, y otros para revestir sus paredes de su vivienda. El socio invertirá el crédito en el revestimiento de su vivienda.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
