The member belongs to the “Las Margaritas de Ocongate” (Ocongate Daisies) communal bank located in Ocongate District in Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

Member Aquiles is 35 years old, married and has four children.  He works as a master builder in civil construction and he wants to use the loan to improve his home.  He’s also a laborer in various projects.  He needs the loan to improve his home and will invest the money purchasing cement, sand and other supplies to recover the walls.  He will invest the loan in recovering the walls of his house.  He is grateful for the support he’ll get and pledges to repay his loan in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Gloria Beatriz

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señorita Gloria, tiene 37 años  de edad, está soltera y vive en casa de su mamá a pesar de que tiene su casa propia que aun no termina por completo.

Se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando lleva mercadería nueva. Trabaja de lunes a viernes de 16h00 hasta las 19h00 ya que a esta hora encuentra siempre a sus clientes, deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Huaquillas cada vez que necesita. Tiene 7 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace  tres ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es terminar por completo  su casa.
texts.en:
The Nueva Ciudad Alfraro Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts which are known both nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

This is the place where Gloria, age 37, lives.  She is single, and she lives in her mother’s house in spite of the fact that she has her own house that is still not completely finished.

She sells all types of clothes door to door.  She also sells at home, where her customers come when she has new merchandise.  She works Monday through Friday from 4:00 p.m. until 7:00 p.m. because this is when she always finds her customers.  She sells on credit and collects every two weeks.  Each time she needs merchandise she goes to Huaquillas to buy it.  She has been doing this business activity for seven years, and it is going very well for her.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise like pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children’s clothes.  She has been in the communal bank for three cycles.  She likes it because of the help that is given with the loans.

Her dream is to completely finish her house.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise like pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children’s clothes.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Doña Maria tiene su propio negocio, una pulperia con mas de veinti cuatro años, trabajando para ayudar  asus dos hijos, es madre soltera. Y comenzo con poco productos mas golosinas, luego comienza hacer prestamo en una financiera en donde comienza ah elevar su inventario.
Hoy en dia trabaja con prestamos en Afodenic, en donde lleva cinco ciclos, lo que han sido para aumentar las ventas. pues se consume mucho el grano basico el cual desea introducir mucho, pues todo ha incrementado ah altos costos, comprara tambien productos lacteos, cajillas de huevo, golosinas. Manteniendo a sus clientes sastifechos. Y logrando verder para cumplir con sus compromisos de pago.
texts.en:
María has had a business of her own, a grocery store, for over 24 years working to help her two children; she’s a single mother.  She started with just a few snack items and later started to take out loans at a financial institution to increase inventory.

At present, she works with Afodenic loans and has been in five cycles that have been used to increase sales.  Because basic grains are consumed quite a bit she wants to stock them in quantity because prices have increased.  She will also buy dairy products, flats of eggs and snacks to keep her customers satisfied to sell and be able to repay her loan.

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Maria Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 47 años vive en Pimampiro a una hora de Ibarra, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos que tienen 23, 19 y nueve años de edad. Carmen se describe como una persona trabajadora y emprendedora.

Trabaja con su esposo y un trabajador a la crianza de cerdos, agricultura, venta de fritada, lo hace desde que era muy joven.

Solicita créditos a FODEMI por 2 años, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de cerdos y su alimentación.

Su sueño es mejorar su calidad de vida, sacar adelante a sus hijos en los estudios y poder acabar su casa.
texts.en:
Carmen, 47, lives in Pimampiro, an hour from Ibarra, with her husband and three children who are 23, 19 and 9 years old.  Carmen describes herself as being a very hardworking, enterprising person.  She works with her husband and a laborer raising pigs, farming and selling fried fast food.  She’s doing this since she was very young.

She’s been asking FODEMI for loans for 2 years and the one she’s asking for now is to buy pigs and feed for them.  Her dream is to improve her quality of life, to complete her children’s education and to be able to finish her house

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed for them.

loans.name: Ricardo Limber

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Ciudad Alfaro se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive Don Ricardo, tiene 48 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 8 años de edad que estudia en  escuela. Su mujer es ama de casa.

Nuestro amigo para ganarse el sustento diario se dedica al comercio, el junto a su esposa elaboran dulces de distintos sabores y formas, para luego llevarlos a vender, vende todos los días ya que sus productos son muy apetecidos. Lleva en este negocio ya por 20 años.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar víveres necesarios para elaborar los dulces. Está en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos puede financiar su negocio.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y que su negocio mejore cada día mas.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ciudad Alfaro” (New City of Alfaro) communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton, noted for its rich pre-colonial culture and its crafts that are well-known nationally and internationally; it’s the place the famous straw hats come from.

Ricardo, 48, lives in this place.  He is in a common law relationship and has an 8-year-old son that goes to school.  His wife’s a housewife.

Our friend earns his livelihood working as a merchant.  Together with his wife he makes candy of various shapes and flavors to then sell.  He sells every day since his products are quite tempting.  He’s been in this business for 20 years now.

This loan will be used to buy foodstuffs needed to make the candy.  He’s been in the communal bank almost since the beginning and likes it because he can finance his business with the loans.  His dreams are to stay in business and that it produces more every day.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es: Lucía es socia del Banco Comunal Musuq Rumi, tiene 3 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 4 años, tiene un tienda de abarrotes, y en ella invertirá el préstamo que sacara ahora ya que si no estuviera en Finca no tendría como mejorar su tienda y ni poder surtir como esta ahora, agradece a Finca ya que le enseñaron a poder ahorrar, y las capacitaciones le ayudaron a poder valorarse como mujer, aprendió a ser mas responsable, y desea que su negocio pueda crecer y Finca podrá ayudar en este propósito.
texts.en: Lucía is a member of the “Musuq Rumi” communal bank.  She has three children and has been a member of FINCA Perú for four years.  She has a grocery store and will invest the loan that she’ll take out now in it because if FINCA did not exist she’d have no way to improve her store or be able to stock it as well as she has.  She thanks FINCA because they taught her how to save and the training helped her value herself as a woman.  She learned how to be more responsible and she hopes that her business will grow and FINCA will be able to help her with this purpose.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia es socia del Banco Comunal Musuq Rumi, tiene un hijo y esta en Finca desde hace 4 años, su negocio es una tienda de Golosinas en el Mercado Nery García, ella siente a que a progresado durante esos 4 años ya que pudo abrir otra sucursal, lo que mas le gusta son las capacitaciones, ellas le ayudaron a poder ser mejor persona, el ahorro es muy importante para ella ya que esos ahorros le ayudaron a poder cumplir lo que se propuso.
texts.en: Aurelia’s a member of the “Musuq Rumi” communal bank.  She has one son and she’s been in Finca for the last four years.  Her business is a snack store in the Nery García market.  She feels that she’s made progress during these four years since she was able to open an additional branch.  What she enjoys the most is the training.  It helped her become a better person.  Savings are important to her because they help her attain what she proposed for herself.

loans.use: to buy snacks at wholesale.

loans.name: Aparicio

texts.es:
Aparicio es socio del Banco Comunal Musuq Rumi, esta en Finca Perú desde hace 8 años, su esposa lo invitó, ella es socia desde hace 16 años, desde esa fecha juntos trabajaron con la ayuda que Finca les daba y pudieron con mucho esfuerzo y responsabilidad obtener una Cancha de Grass Sintético, pudieron terminar su casa y se compraron su carrito, tambien tienen un puesto de venta de carne en el Mercado Nery Garcia.
aparicio esta muy agradecido con los prestamos que recibe, porque contribuyeron a poder cumplir sus sueños y ahora su deseo es poder enviar a estudiar a sus hijos al extranjero, el prestamo que solicita lo invertirá en comprar reces para poder venderlas.
texts.en:
Aparicio’s a member of the “Musuq Rumi” communal bank.  He’s been in Finca Perú for 8 years.  His wife invited him; she’s been a member for 16 years.  Since then, they’ve worked together with Finca’s help and with much effort and responsibility were able to obtain a synthetic grass playing field, finish their house and buy a car.  They also have a stand in the Nery García market selling meat.

Aparicio is very grateful for the loans he gets because they contributed to his being able to realize his dreams.  Now his wish is to send his children abroad to study.  The loan he’s asking for will be used to buy beef at wholesale to sell.

loans.use: to buy beef at wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La Sra. María es casada, tiene dos hijas en edad escolar; ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, bollos y bizcochos; ya lleva en este negocio más de 10 años, eligió este trabajo por sus tías ya que también se dedicaban a este negocio; gana aproximadamente  S/300 nuevos soles semanal; el crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en el mejoramiento de su vivienda (compra de puertas y ventanas) ya que estas se encuentra deterioradas por el tiempo; su principal desafío que enfrenta es el frio y las enfermedades virales que en este tiempo da. Su sueño es ver crecer su negocio y poner una panadería grande, ella está muy atardecida por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Maria is married, has two school-age daughters. She earns her living making and selling bread, buns, and biscuits. She has had this business for more than 10 years, and she chose this work because of her aunts who also work in this business. She earns about 300 nuevo soles per week. 

She will invest the loan granted to her into improving her home, which has deteriorated over time. The main challenge she faces is the cold and the viral diseases this season brings. Her dream is to see her business grow and install a large oven. She is very grateful for the awarded loan.

loans.use: to purchase doors and windows to improve her home

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Felix es socio del Banco Comunal Musuq Rumi, tiene 4 hijos y se dedica a la venta de carne en el Mercado Nery García, él y su familia tienen una chacra en la selva y un carrito, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en comprar una maquinaria que le falta para cosechar en su chacra, todo esto es producto del esfuerzo y de los préstamos que ha recibido, permitiendole cumplir sus metas, da gracias a Finca por las ensenzas y por lo aprendido, ahora sabe ahorrar y tambien mantener y producir su negocio, siente que ha progresado en todo lo que se ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Felix is a member of the Musuq Rumi Communal Bank.  He has four children, and he sells meat in the Nery García Market.  He and his family have a small farm in the jungle and a cart.

Now he will use the loan to buy machinery that he needs for the harvest on his farm.  All of this is a product of effort and of the loans that he has received, which are allowing him to meet his goals.

He is grateful to Finca for the training and what he has learned.  He now knows to save, and he also knows how to maintain his business and how to produce.  He feels that he had made progress in everything that he has proposed to do.

loans.use: to buy machinery that he needs for the harvest on his farm.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Elena tiene 36 años vive en Otavalo junto con su esposo y sus 6 hijos que tienen 17,14,10,8,6 y 3 años de edad; se considera como una persona sencilla, respetuosa y trabajadora.

Se dedica a la venta de ropa con su esposo por 9 años; trabaja con FODEMI con unos tres créditos, el crédito que solicita actualmente es para la compra de mercadería (ropa) para su venta y mejorar sus ingresos.

Su sueño es de crecer su negocio, tener su casa propia y darles la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elena is 36 years old and lives in Otavalo with her husband and 6 children aged 17, 14, 10, 8, 6 and 3.  She considers herself a simple, respectful and hardworking person.

She has sold clothes with her husband for the past 9 years and has had three loans through FODEMI.  The loan she is currently seeking is for the purchase of merchandise (clothes) that she can sell and increase her income.

Her dream is to grow her business, have her own home, and provide an education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nuevo Paraiso (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socios  del Grupo De  Crédito Nuevo Paraíso. Los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, prestación de servicios entre otras actividades. Ellos hace poco y al conocer de los beneficios que brinda la institución decidieron unirse  y  poder acceder a los créditos que brinda La  Fundación Espoir, este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal   y esperan cumplir muy bien para seguir recibiendo los beneficios que da la institución.

Aquí conocimos a Lissette tiene 20 años de edad, está soltera y vive en casa de sus padres. Ella estudia el tercer semestre de Auditoria en la Universidad Técnica de Manabí.

Nuestra amiga además de estudiar y con el fin de ganar algo para solventar los gastos de sus estudios se dedica a la venta de zapatos por catálogo. Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja todos los días y a la hora que este desocupada, ella enseña sus revistas para que sus clientes hagan los pedidos y cuando recibe la mercadería hace las entregas, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Lleva dos años dedicada a este negocio y le ha ido bastante bien.

Este crédito es para comprar zapatos para la venta. Este es su primer ciclo al igual que todo el grupo y le gusta por la rapidez que salen los créditos.

Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios, ser una gran profesional y conseguir un buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Every two weeks the members of the “Nuevo Paraíso” (New Paradise) communal bank meet.  They are engaged in a variety of activities such as: general commerce and providing services, among others.  A short time ago, having learned about the benefits that the institution provides, decided to join together to be able to access loans that Fundación Espoir makes available.  This is their first cycle in the communal bank and they expect to fulfill their obligations very well to continue receiving the benefits the institution provides.

We met Lissette, 20, here.  She’s single living in her parents’ house.  She’s studying third semester Accounting at Manabí’s Universidad Técnica.

Aside from studying, in order to earn a bit to cover her educational expenses, our friend sells shoes via catalogue.  She sells door to door every day in her free time.  She shows the catalogues to her customers so that they can place orders and when she receives the merchandise she makes her deliveries.  She sells on credit and collects payment every two weeks.  She’s been in this business two years and has done quite well.

This loan is to buy shoes to sell.  This is her first cycle like the rest of the group and she likes it because the loans are granted quickly.  Her dreams are to finish her schooling and to become a great professional and get a good job.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, de 23 años es una mujer joven, alegre y muy trabajadora. Es conviviente y vive junto a su pareja en casa de su suegra. Ella es madre de dos niños de tres y de un año y medio, ellos son su motivo de seguir adelante.Rocío trabaja en su bodega, tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes. Ella compra al por mayor para poder venderlo al menudeo y así obtener ganancias, actividad que realiza en su casa. Lleva tres años en este negocio y trabaja sola ya que su pareja trabaja en un aserradero y así generan ambos los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. En este trabajo le está yendo regular a Rocío, ya que esta manteniendo su bodega pero le falta aun muchas cosas para poder tenerla surtida.Lo que le gusta de su bodega es que siempre hay movimiento y lo que no le gusta es que hay personas que vienen en afán de pedir crédito y son los que se tardan en pagar y debilitan al negocio, espera mas adelante poder tener una bodega surtida como la que siempre tubo y asi tener mas ingresos.Este es el sexto préstamo entre Rocío y la institución MFP, se siente tranquila en su grupo ya que consideran son buenos todos y agradece mucho la oportunidad que le da MFP para poder hacer inversión y generar ganancias para su hogar.Con el monto solicitado, 2000 soles ella comprar abarrotes y pasamanería para su negocio y así poder crecer junto a su negocio.
texts.en:
Rocío, age 23, is a happy and very hard-working young woman.  She is in a common-law-marriage, and she lives with her life partner in her mother-in-law’s house.  She has two children, ages three and one and a half.  They are her motivation for getting ahead.

She works in her grocery store.  She has a small grocery store.  She buys wholesale in order to be able to sell for retail and get income that way.  She works at home.  She has been in this business for three years.  She works alone because he life partner works at a saw mill.  That way they both generate the income needed for their household. 

This work is going so-so for Rocío.  She is maintaining her grocery store; she still needs a lot of things in order for it to be stocked.  What she likes about her grocery store is that there is always action.  What she does not like is that there are people who come with the desire to ask for credit.  They are the ones who are late in paying, and they weaken her business.  Later she hopes to be able to have a store that is stocked like she always had.  That way she will have more income.

This is the sixth loan that Rocío has had with the MFP institution.  Her mind is at ease in the group because they are all considered to be good.  She is very grateful for the opportunity that MFP gives her in order to be able to invest and generate income for her household.  She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy groceries and ornamental trim for clothing for her business.  That way she will be able to grow together with her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries and ornamental trim for clothing for her business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Luis Hugo

texts.es: El Sr. Luis es casado, tiene una hija de 2 años de edad, el Sr. Luis se dedica a prestar el servicio de mecánica y a su vez alquila una moto taxi; el Sr. Luis tiene deseos de progresar por ello solicitó el crédito para la compra de equipos y herramientas de mecánica y también para dar mantenimiento a su moto taxi; su sueño del Sr. Luis es tener una mejor calidad de vida y tener su propio taller de mecánica automotriz. El  Sr. Luis está muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en: Luis is married and has a 2-year-old daughter. He provides auto mechanic services and also rents out a motorcycle taxi. He wishes to make progress, so he requested the loan in order to purchase auto repair equipment and tools, and also to provide maintenance for his motorcycle taxi. His dream is to have a better quality of life and to own his own auto repair shop. Luis is very thankful for the loan he received.

loans.use: to purchase auto repair equipment and tools.

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: Carla, tiene 22 años, es madre soltera de un niño quien vive junto a ella. Juntos habitan en casa de sus padres, con ellos y su menor hermana. El trabajo de Carla consiste en la venta de ropa a plazo, visita a sus amigos, vecinos  y familiares en busca de clientes, lleva haciendo esta actividad casi por un año. Le gusta éste trabajo, pues es independiente tanto en tiempo como en su economía. Sin embargo el tener que salir a vender en pleno sol, le resluta muy pesado y agotado. Considera rentable su negocio por que se lleva un promedio del 50 % en ganancia de acuerdo a su inversión, piensa algún día poder tener un local propio o alquilado en donde pueda seguir haciendo este trabajo. Este es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para segir trabajando. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ropa de vestir importados y nacionales para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Carla is 22 years old.  She is a single mother and has a son that lives with her.  Together they live with her parents and younger sister in their house.  Carla sells clothing and her customers pay her in installments.  She visits her friends, neighbors and family looking for customers.  She has been doing this for almost a year.  She likes this work as she can work independently and manage her time and finances.  However, since she has to walk around in the sun to sell it is very hard and exhausting work.  She considers her business profitable because she makes an average of 50% in profit over her investment.  She plans to some day have her own or a rented local where she can continue her work.  

This is her second loan with MFP and she hopes that everyone's support will allow her to continue working.  With the amount requested she will buy imported and domestic clothing to meet her customer demand.

loans.use: purchase clothing to meet her customer demand.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela, D. 48 años, es una mujer emprendedora que no le teme a los retos ni al trabajo, esta casada y es madre D. dos hijas D. 20 y 12 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas. El trabajo D. Estela consiste en atender su propio multiservicios que tiene en su casa, esta muy implementado y tiene D. todo, además ella presta sus servicios como costurera, lleva con este trabajo ya cinco años, lo hace con sus hijas quienes le ayudan cuando ella esta un poco ocupada con la costura. Lo que le gusta D. su trabajo es que pueD. hacer dos actividades al mismo tiempo, además siempre tiene ingresos y muy buenos clientes ya que ahora tiene un contrato con una tienda D. disfraces a quienes abastece semanalmente. Espera mas adelante poder ampliar su multiservicios, además D. instalar un taller donD. pueda coser con mayor comodidad. Este es el crédito número 8 con MFP y esta muy contenta D. trabajar con su grupo ya que los considera buenos copañeros D. trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos para su multiservicio y algunos pequeños materiales para la costura, como hilos y telas.
texts.en:
Estela, aged 48, is an enterprising woman who is not afraid of challenges or work. She is married and the mother of two daughters, aged 20 and 12. She lives in her own house with her husband and her two daughters.

Estela's work consists in running her multiservice business in her home. It is well implemented in her neighborhood and has everything. In addition, Estela offers her services as a seamstress. She has had this business for already five years. She runs it with her daughters who help her when she is busy sewing. She likes her work because she can do two activities at the same time, she has always an income and she has very good customers. Currently she has a contract with a costume store with weekly deliveries. She also hopes to expand her multiservice business and set up a workshop where she can sew more comfortably.

This is her eighth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She is very happy to work with her group because her fellow members are good colleagues. Estela will use her loan to buy products for her multiservice business and a few small items for her sewing activity, such as threads and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy threads and fabrics.

loans.name: Las Mercedes (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Mercedes se reúne cada quince días en la hermosa ciudad de Calceta, ciudad conocida con el nombre de “Calceta la sin par”. Por la belleza de sus mujeres y porque para sus habitantes no hay ciudad más hermosa en el mundo.

Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace cuatro meses atrás y formar este Banco Comunal que les ha servido de mucho para mejorar sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

En este lugar vive la señora Paula, tiene 40 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos de 20, 16, 14, 11 y 9 años de edad,  dos estudian en colegio y dos en escuela. El marido es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga realiza quehaceres domésticos en una casa, pero además tiene un pequeño negocio en su casa, en el vende jugos, sodas, comidas rápidas como bolones de verde, empanadas, corviches y almuerzos. Como su casa está muy cerca de un colegio ella aprovechan que tanto alumnos como profesores de dicha institución llegan hasta su pequeño local a servirse sus productos, ella muy temprano junto a su hija mayor preparan todos los alimentos y luego su hija se encarga de vender ya que ella tiene que ir a su trabajo. Lleva 4 meses en este negocio y fue con el primer crédito que empezó y le está yendo bastante bien.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos, lleva dos ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brinda el banco. 

Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.

La foto pequeña adjunta es de una de las socias que por motivo de enfermedad no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en: The Communal Bank Las Mercedes ("the favors") meets every fortnight in the beautiful city of Calceta, known as "Calceta the unrivaled" because of the beauty of its women and because its inhabitants believe that there is no more beautiful city in the world. This is a group of people who decided to join together four months ago and create this communal bank, which has provided them many services to improve their small businesses. The group members have various businesses, such as trade, services, sale of food and other activities. Here lives Señora Paula. She is 40 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She has five children aged 20, 16, 14, 11 and 9. Two of them attend secondary school and two go to elementary school. Her husband is a merchant. Our friend does the chores in a house, but she also has a small store at home where she sells juice, soda, fast food like fried green plantain dumplings, empanadas, corviches, and lunch. Since her home is very close to a school, she took advantage of the fact that students and teachers of the institution came to her small store and bought her products. Early in the morning she and her eldest daughter begin to prepare all the ingredients. After that the daughter stays in the store and sells, while the mother must go to work. Paula has been in this activity for the past four months. It was with the first loan that she launched her activity and she is doing quite well. This loan will be used to buy ingredients for her dishes. She took two loans in her communal bank and is grateful for the support offered by the bank. Her dream is to own a great restaurant. The small photo pictures one of the members who was sick when the group was photographed.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her dishes.

loans.name: Lily

texts.es: Lily tiene 32 años, es una mujer alegre y muy trabajadora, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos. Juntos habitan en casa de su padre. El trabajo de Lily consiste en la venta de comida por las noches en un pequeño espacio de su casa. Recién lleva poco meses en este trabajo y cuenta con la ayuda de su hermana. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, ya que siempre trabajó en este negocio, asimismo vende ropa y algunos accesorios, también posee tres mototaxis, que los alquila, logrando obtener ingresos fijos. En adelante quisiera intalar un negocio de comida en su casa, pues se ubica en el Km. 6 de la carretera y eso le daría mucha ventaja. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, considera que su grupo es muy bueno y muy responsables, espera poder seguir trabajando junto a la institución ya que le encanta que confíen en ella y que le den la oportunidad de creer como negociante. Con el monto solicitado, comprará un mototaxi más, ya que su meta es poner una flota de transporte para que pueda generar más ganancia.
texts.en:
Lily is thirty-two-years-old.  She is a happy and very hard-working woman.  She lives with her partner, with whom she has two children.  They all live together in her father's house.  Lily's sells food during the evenings from a small space in her house, which she's been doing for just a few months, with help from her her sister.  She really likes what she does because she has always done this kind of work. She also sells clothing and accessories, and she has three motorcycle taxis that she rents out, giving her fixed income. 

In the future, Lily would like to have a restaurant in her house, because she lives at Km 6 on the freeway and the location would give her a big advantage.  This will be her third loan cycle with MFP.  She thinks her group is really good and very responsible.  She hopes to keep working with MFP because she loves how they trust her and give her the chance to believe in herself as a businesswoman.  With loan she's seeking, she'll buy another motorcycle taxi because it's her goal to have a fleet so she can make more profit.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Julia Robertina

texts.es:
La Señora Julia es socia del banco comunal Barrio Sucre, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este sector  es de clima frió y tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, carismática, mantienen las tradiciones y cultura de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y cría de animales, mucha de su población ha migrado o salen diariamente a la ciudad a laborar en diferentes actividades.
 
Doña Julia tiene 47 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos  de 29, 27, 26, 20 y 9 años de edad, tres de sus hijos son casados e independientes, su primer hijo es soltero trabaja solo para sus gastos personales, su último hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Julia se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos y como pasa en casa cría ganado, pollos, cuyes y chanchos los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de un toro.
 
Su meta es tener más animales.
texts.en:
Julia belongs to the Barrio Sucre village bank and lives in the Cumbe parish.  The climate is cold and has a beautiful view of nature. The people are friendly, charismatic, and keep up the traditions and culture of their parents. They work in agriculture and livestock. Much of the population has migrated or travels daily to the city to do various kinds of work.

Julia is forty-seven and married. Her marriage has produced five children, who are 29, 27, 26, 20, and 9. Three of her children are married and on their own. Her first son is single and works alone to support himself. Her youngest son is in school in the city. Her husband is a mason, and they live in their own house.

Julia is a homemaker, and because she's at home she can raise cattle, chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs to sell in her community.  

This is Julia's third loan with the village bank, and she plans to invest it in a bull.  Her goal is to have more animals.

loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Leonor Patricia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Leonor socia del banco comunal Barrio Sucre, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este sector es de clima frió y tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, carismática, mantienen las tradiciones y cultura de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y cría de animales, mucha de su población ha migrado o salen diariamente a la ciudad a laborar en diferentes actividades.
 
La Señorita. Leonor tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera vive con su madre quien se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de su mamá.
 
Nuestra socia labora en un negocio de comida que tiene su hermana, esta actividad la realiza 4 días a la semana. También en su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos y chanchos.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su séptimo crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos.

Su meta es tener su propio negocio como una tienda o algún otro tipo de negocio.
texts.en:
Leonor belongs to the Barrio Sucre village bank and lives in the Cumbe parish.  The climate there is cold and they have a great view of nature.  The people are friendly, full of charisma, and they maintain their parents' culture and traditions.  They farm and raise animals.  Many of them have migrated or go to the city on a daily basis for various kinds of work.

Leonor is twenty-nine, single, and lives with her mother, who farms and raises cattle.  They live in her mother's house.  

Leonor works in her sister's restaurant four days a week. At home she also raises chickens and pigs.

This will be her seventh loan with the village bank and she plans to buy pigs. Her goal is to have her own business, like a store, or perhaps something different.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es: Mirna tiene 55 años, es una mujer trabajadora y muy responsable, es viuda y madre de dos hijos de 32 y  20 años con quienes vive en casa propia. El trabajo de Mirna es la venta de comida, actividad que lo realiza en su casa, de lunes a sábado, pero los domingo y feriados vende cebiche, plato tipico peruano, y que tiene mucha demanda por parte de sus clientes. Lleva ya cuatro años en este negocio, y durante este tiempo ha crecido mucho como negociante y por consecuente en su economía. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para poder ayudar a su hija con el cuidado de su nieto, además de poder hacer otras actividades en su hogar, espera por ahora solo mantener su negocio y espera se consolide con el tiempo. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, y esta contenta de pertenecer a éste grupo comunal, pues todos son muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales para arreglar su local además de algunas piezas para arreglar su mototaxi, que lo utiliza para transportar su insumos del mercado a su casa.
texts.en:
55-year-old Mirna is a very hard working and responsible woman. She is a widow and mother of two children aged 32 and 20, whom she lives with in a house of their own. Mirna's occupation is selling food, which she does from her house from Monday to Saturday. On Sundays and holidays she sells ceviche, a typical Peruvian dish which is in great demand by her customers. 

Mirna has been running her food sales business for four years. During this time she has grown a lot as a businesswoman, and her economy has improved as a result. What Mirna likes about her work is that she still has time to help her daughter look after her grandson, along with other activities at home. At the moment her aim is just to keep her business going, and she hopes to strengthen it over time. This is Mirna's sixth loan with MFP, and she is happy to be part of this community group as they are all very responsible. With the money she has requested, Mirna will buy materials to improve her premises as well as some parts to fix her mototaxi which she uses to transport supplies to her home market.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for her premises, and fix her mototaxi

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. María socia del banco comunal Barrio Sucre, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este sector es de clima frió y tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, carismática mantienen las tradiciones y cultura de sus padres, se dedican a la agricultura y cría de animales, mucha de su población ha migrado o salen diariamente a la ciudad a laborar en diferentes actividades.
 
La Señora María tiene 57 años, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 9 hijos, 3 de ellos son casados e independientes, 4 trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, 1 estudia en la universidad y 1 estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, la casa en la que habita es de una de sus hijas.
 
Doña María se dedica a la venta de comida en un mercado de la ciudad, labora sin un horario fijo 4 días a la semana y tiene este negocio 21 años. En su casa se dedica a la cría de cuyes y gallinas que son para su consumo y para la venta.
 
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes y chanchos, se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal.

Su meta es crecer en el negocio de cría de animales.
texts.en:
Mrs. María is a member of the Barrio Sucre communal bank. She lives in the Cumbe parish. This sector has a cold climate and a beautiful view of nature. Its people are kind, charismatic, and maintain the traditions and culture of their parents. They work in agriculture and raise animals. A lot of the population has moved away or travel to the city every day to work various jobs.

Mrs. Maria is 57, married, and has 9 children from this union. Three of these children are married and independent, four work and help out economically, one is in university and one attends a school in the city. Her husband works as a private employee. They live in the home of one of her daughters.

Maria sells food in a market in the city. She works without a fixed schedule 4 days a week and has had this business for 21 years. In her home, she raises guinea pigs and hens for her consumption and for sale.

She will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of guinea pigs and pigs. This is her second loan in the communal bank.

Her goal is to expand her business raising animals.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and pigs.

loans.name: Hortencia Guillermina

texts.es:
La Señorita Hortensia es socia del banco comunal Zhullin, vive en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es hermosa por su estructura que se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente son personas amables, gentiles y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señorita. Hortensia tiene 40 años de edad, es soltera vive con su madre quien se dedica a la agricultura, comparten los gastos del hogar y la casa en la que habita es de propiedad de su madre.
 
Nuestra socia labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo y para la venta, también se dedica  a la venta de leche que obtiene de sus animales y que compra a otros productores. Cría  cuyes, cerdos y pollos que son también para la venta.

Este es su primer crédito  que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de leche para continuar con este negocio.
 
Su sueño es  viajar a la ciudad de Panamá.
texts.en:
Miss Hortensia is a member of the Zhullin communal bank. She lives in the city of Azogues. This city is beautiful because of its mixture of colonial and modern architecture. Its people are pleasant, kind, and maintain their culture and traditions.

Miss Hortensia is 40, single, and lives with her mother who works in agriculture. They share the household costs and the home in which they live belongs to her mother.

Hortensia works in agriculture, and her harvest is for her consumption and for sale. She also sells milk from her animals and milk that she buys from other producers. She raises guinea pigs, hogs, and chickens which are also for sale.

This is her first loan in the communal bank and she will invest it in the purchase of milk in order to continue with this business.

Her dream is to travel to Panama city.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: María Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia del banco comunal Zhullin, vive en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es hermosa por su estructura que se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente son personas amables, gentiles y mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña María tiene 32 años, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 14 y 9 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y su segunda hija en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en su lugar de trabajo.
 
La Señora María se dedica a cuidar una quinta, allí cuida a los animales y labora en la agricultura, lleva 11 años en esta actividad y labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. También tiene la oportunidad de criar sus propios animales como cuyes y pollos.
 
Este es su quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y cuyes.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa la misma que está en construcción.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Zhullin communal bank. She lives in the Azogues city. This is a beautiful city because of the mixture of colonial and modern architecture. Its people are kind and pleasant, and maintain their culture and traditions.

Mrs. Maria is 32, a widow, and has two children from that union. They are 9 and 14. Her son, the oldest, is in school, and her younger daughter attends a small school in the city. She does not have her own home so she lives where she works.

Maria tends to a farm. There she cares for the animals and works in agriculture. She has been doing this for 11 years and works every day of the week without a fixed schedule. She also has the opportunity to raise her own animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens.

This is her fifth loan in the communal bank and she will invest it in the purchase of chickens and guinea pigs.

Her goal is to finish building her home, which is under construction.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Maria Felix

texts.es:
La señora María, de 39 años de edad, es originaria de Telica municipio de León, esta casada, es madre de dos niños, ella es comerciante se dedica a elaborar nacatamales. Ella empezó con esta actividad hace 20 años cuando se caso su suegra le enseño como hacer nacatamales, al principio ella esta temerosa pues no sabia mucho pero cuando aprendió e sorprendió de los resultado pues fue adquiriendo buena clientela, fue aumentado sus ventas, pues su productos tuvo muy buen demanda y recibió elogios por sabor de sus deliciosos nacatamales y esto la motivo mas aun para sacar adelante y emprender su negocio. 
Requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz al por mayor, pues es uno de los ingredientes principales del nacatamal y comprar cerdos para crianza. Esta inversión le facilitaría la compra de maíz al por mayor, lo compraría mas barato y almacenaría para cuando sufra incremento en el precio.
Su meta próxima es hacerle reparaciones a su negocio, para darle una mejor apariencia y almacenar inventario para vender.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria, age 39, is from Telica in the Leon municipality. She is a married mother of two children. She is a merchant who makes nactamales. She started this activity 20 years ago. When she got married, her mother-in-law taught her how to make nactamales. In the beginning she was unsure, because she did not know much, but she learned and was surprised by the results. She has acquired a good clientele, her sales have increased, and her products have been in great demand. She has received praise for the flavour of her delicious nactamales, and this motivated her even more to get ahead and take on her business.

She needs this loan to purchase corn whohlesale, as it is one of the main ingredients for nactamales; and to purchase hogs for raising. This investment will allow her to purchase corn wholesale. She will be able to buy it cheaper and stock up against price increases.
Her next goal is to make repairs to her business, in order to give it a better appearance, and to stock up inventory to sell.

loans.use: to purchase corn wholesale, as it is one of the main ingredients for nactamal; and to purchase hogs to raise.

loans.name: Cruz Magdalena

texts.es:
La Señora Cruz es socia del banco comunal vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad  es de clima frió, es la tercera ciudad más importante  del país, tienen una hermosa arquitectura que se mezcla entre lo colonia y lo moderno, su gente es amable y mantiene su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña Cruz tiene 44 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 28, 25 y 22 años de edad, todos sus hijos son casados e independientes. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora como taxista, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
La Señora. Cruz se dedica a la venta de gelatina en un mercado de la ciudad,  esta actividad la desempeña hace 20 años.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su hija, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en su negocio ya que va a viajar a otra ciudad para vender su producto en las fiestas y necesita para el trasporte, estadía y alimentación.
 
Su meta es crecer cada día más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Cruz is a member of the communal bank who lives in the city of Cuenca.  This city has a cool climate.  It is the third most important city in the country, and has beautiful architecture that is a combination of colonial and modern.  Its people are friendly and keep up their culture and traditions.

Doña Cruz is 44 years old. She is married, and has 3 children from her marriage who are aged 28, 25, and 22 years old.  All of her children are married and financially independent.  Her husband is a driver by profession; he works as a taxi driver.  They do not have their own house, so they live in a rental.

Señora Cruz works selling jello at a market in the city, an activity that she has been engaged in for the last 20 years.

This is her first loan through the communal bank, to which she was invited by her daughter.  She will invest the money from her loan into her business, as she will be traveling to another city to sell her products for the festivals, and needs the loan to pay for transport, accommodation, and food.

Her goal is to grow her business on a daily basis.

loans.use: to pay for transport, accommodation and food.

loans.name: Mirza

texts.es: Mirza tiene 50 años, es una mujer amable y muy abierta, le gusta mucho entablar dialogo y es muy querida en su grupo, ella esta casada y vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 28, 21 y 18 años. Ella se dedica a brindar el servicio de corte de cabello, permanente, ondulaciones, teñidos y otros paquetes y productos que ofrece en su local acondicionado en la sala de casa. Lleva realizando este trabajo por mas de quince años, con este trabajo más lo que aporta su esposo y gracias a la ayuda de la institución ella pudo mejorar las condiciones de su casa en cuanto a infraestructura. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene disponibilidad de su tiempo y ella misma pone su horario, como saben que hace buen trabajo entonces tiene muchos clientes. Por ahora tiene en mente poder agrandar su casa para así poder instalar un salón de belleza. Este es el crédito número 12 con MFP, esta feliz de pertenecer a este grupo ya que son muy unidos, y espera poder seguir trabajando junto a ellos con la institución. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales para implementar su negocio, además de ofrecer más productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Mirza is 50 years old and is a very kind and open-hearted woman.  She enjoys starting conversations and is very well loved within her group of friends.  She is married and lives in her own house together with her husband and her three children ages 28, 21, and 18.  She provides services such as hair cuts, permanents, waves, color treatments and other packages and products that she offers at her business, which is located in the living room of her home.  She has been working at this job for more than fifteen years.  With this business in addition to what her husband contributes and thanks to the aid of this institution, she was able to improve the conditions of her house, specifically the infrastructure.  What she enjoys most about her work is that she has flexibility with her time, because she makes her own schedule.  Since she knows how to do a good job, she has many customers.  For now, she has in mind to enlarge her house in order to be able to add a beauty salon.  This is her 12th loan with MFP.  She is happy to belong to this group which is very close and she hopes to be able to continue working together with them.  With the loan requested, she will buy materials to use in her business as well as more products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to acquire new products and materials for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Ana Eugenia

texts.es: La señora  Ana es cliente antiguo desde el año 2009, esta en su  quinta secuencia de su crédito individual, la cliente vive en la zona el tejar, la Sra.  Ana  se dedica  ala venta de artefactos y  víveres  que da a crédito, tiene  aproximadamente 50 clientes en la mayoría son choferes de varios sindicatos de la ciudad de la Paz. El crédito  invertirá en la compra de canastones para el fin de año. La Sra. Ana es casada y tiene dos hijos  que ella sola se encarga de su educación y su esposo Jorge es costurero que se encuentra en Argentina y  llega a Bolivia  dos veces al año, envía dinero a su familia, pero lo que la Sra. Ana desea es tener de vuelta a su familia.
texts.en: Ana has been a client since 2009 and this is her fifth personal loan cycle.  She lives in el Tejar region and sells appliances and food supplies on credit.  She has about 50 customers: the majority are drivers from different unions in La Paz.  She will use the loan to buy baskets for New Year’s.  Ana is married and has two children and she is in charge of their education.  Her husband, Jorge, is a dressmaker and is in Argentina.  He comes back to Bolivia twice a year and sends money to his family, but Ana wants him to return to be with his family.

loans.use: to buy baskets

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 42 años, es una mujer emprendedora y muy alegre, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos de 19, 14 y 10 años, juntos habitan en su casa que es propia. El trabajo de Rosa consiste en la venta de ropa, es así que se dirige a los caseríos en busca de clientes para ofrecer su producto y algunos accesorios de vestir. Tiene 7 años realizando este negocio, y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para disponer de su horario, y eso le hace ser una mujer independiente, por ahora su objetivo es consolidarse en su negocio. Este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, y está muy agradecida pro la oportunidad de acceder a este crédito para crecer su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más ropa, con el fin de tener variedad de mercadería y pueda ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Rosa is 42 years old. She is a self-starter and has a positive attitude. She lives with her partner and their three children, 19, 14, and 10 respectively. The family has their own house. Rosa's business is selling clothes. She travels to various neighborhoods looking for clients and selling them her clothing and accessories. She has been running this business for seven years. Her favorite thing about this job is that she can control her own work schedule, and this makes her feel like an independent woman. Her current goal is to strengthen her business. This will be her eighth loan with MFP, and she is very thankful for the opportunity to have access to credit. She will purchase more clothing with the loan in order to offer more variety to her clients.

loans.use: purchase more clothing to increase inventory for her clothing store.

loans.name: 3 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Phương is 38 years old and married. She has two children. Phương is the group leader of the 3 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

Phương has a retail business selling general household commodities. She is requesting a loan to purchase household commodities to resell. Phương has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Phương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Phương hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase household commodities to resell.

loans.name: Cecilia Celia

texts.es: La señora  Cecilia es un cliente antiguo que ingreso el año 2006 con el grupo LLallagua y después se armo el grupo las Sorias trabajando en ese grupo como cuatro secuencias y posteriormente se le otorgo el crédito individual que ya esta en su  cuarta secuencia demostrando puntualidad en sus La Sra. Cecilia se dedica a la venta D. envases D. plásticos,  El crédito  invertirá en la compra D. plásticos, tapers, baldes, tazas y platos. La cliente vive en la zona la portada La Sra. Cecilia es viuda tiene tres hijos y actualmente están en edad escolar. La Sra. Cecilia  trabaja sacrificadamente  para salir adelante con su negocio en la venta D.  plásticos.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a long-time client who joined the "Llallagua" group in 2006.  Later, when the "Las Sorias" group was set up, she worked with that group for four loans. Afterwards, she was granted loans on an individual basis. She is now on her fourth loan, and is making her payments on time.

Cecilia sells plastic containers. She will use the loan to buy plastic containers, tupperware, pails, cups and plates. This client lives in the La Portada neighborhood. Cecilia is a widow with three school-age children.  Cecilia works in a self-sacrificing way to get ahead in her plastic container business.

loans.use: To buy plastic containers of all types.

loans.name: Daria

texts.es: La Sra. Daria  se dedica a la fabricación y comercialización de muebles de madera como ser roperos, cómodas, peinadores, juntamente con su esposo el taller se encuentra en su domicilio donde vive en alquiler hace 6 años; tiene experiencia de 10 años  realiza la distribución de los muebles; tiene dos hijos actualmente ella se hace cargo de los estudios y manutención de sus hijos tanto la Sra. como su esposo; su trabajo es abnegado ya que comienzan la producción de los muebles desde la madrugada hasta entrada la noche; indica que es la única fuente de ingreso,  la señora revela  que el crédito  es de gran ayuda porque con este dinero aumentara capital de trabajo comprando madera para aumentar la producción asimismo la comercialización de los muebles de madera.
texts.en: Mrs. Daria works alongside her husband making and selling wooden furniture like closets, wardrobes, and vanities. The shop is located at the house which they have been renting for six years. She has been in this business for ten years selling furniture to different clients. She and her husband have two children who they are supporting through their studies. She works selflessly from the early morning until after nightfall. The furniture sales are her only income. Mrs. Daria says the loan is of great help because it will give her the capital to purchase more wood. This will allow her to increase production and as a result sell more furniture.

loans.use: purchase wood to make furniture

loans.name: Batzaya

texts.en:
Batzaya is a 28 years old.  She is married to Ochnyam and has one daughter. They live in a small house which is located in an outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia.  In 2004, she graduated from Agricultural University of Mongolia, with a Bachelors degree of Agricultural Inspector. 

Currently, she works as a store clerk in the largest local retail company while her daughter attends primary school. Batzaya’s husband works at Ulaanbaatar Power Plant. Both Batzaya and her husband are busy during business days.  Therefore, Batzaya’s mother helps them by babysitting their daughter.  The family house needs renovation, as it has become old.  

Batzaya is requesting a 2,000,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase necessary materials, such as a cement, bricks and wood, to renovate and insulate her small house.  The temperature in winter can reach to below -30 C and consume almost 40 percent of household income on energy costs.  Batzaya is a hardworking woman who hopes to make safe and comfortable living standards for her family.

loans.use: to purchase necessary construction materials for renovation her house

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia tiene 49 años, es una mujer muy dinámica y trabajadora, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijas, pero solo vive con dos de ellas. El trabajo que realiza es la venta de zapatos, ropa y lencería, productos que ofrece a sus amigas, vecinas y familiares. Lleva con este trabajo alrededor de 22 años, le va bien hasta ahora, además que lo hace en compañía de su esposo, además de tener tiempo para poder hacer otras cosas más. Por el momento ella solo piensa mantener su negocio, por ello desea abastecerse de más mercadería para ofrecer variedad de clientes. Este es el crédito número 15 con MFP, y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para crecer su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más productos para su venta como ropa, zapato, lencería y otros objetos.
texts.en: Sonia is 49 years old and is a very dynamic and hardworking woman. She lives with her common-law husband and 2 of the 3 daughters she had with  him. She works selling shoes, clothes and lingerie to her friends, neighbours and relatives. She has been in this business for about 22 years and up until now she is doing well. In addition, she gets to work with her husband and it gives her free time to do other things. For now, she is thinking of only maintaining the business. She therefore wants to stock up on more merchandise to offer a variety of products to her clients. This is her 15th loan with MFP and therefore hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you to grow her business. With the amount requested, she will buy more products to sell such as clothes, shoes, lingerie and other products.

loans.use: to buy more clothing, shoes and lingerie

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle is 44 years-old and married with four children. With two children in school, Anabelle works very hard to provide for them.

Anabelle runs a sari sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Anabelle has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, egg, noodles, etc.. 

In the futur,e Anabelle would like to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Nashiba

texts.en:
Nashiba works hard to support her family. Nashiba is married and has a business buying and selling ready to wear in the Philippines.

Nashiba requested a PHP 13,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to purchase additional clothing stock to sell.

Nashiba has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Nashiba would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothing stock to sell.

loans.name: Miriam Veronica

texts.es: La Sra. Miriam se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y adultos de tela polar; tiene experiencia de 5 años  su puesto de venta se encuentra en una de las calles mas concurridas de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  sale a vender los días de feria que son los miércoles y sábados  los cuales son días en los cuales están habilitados para realizar la comercialización de mercadería,  los días en que no sale a vender trabaja como chofer de su propio vehículo en una línea de taxi trufis,  vive en domicilio familiar de sus papas, tiene tres hijos actualmente se hace cargo de los estudios y manutención de sus hijos; su esposo se encuentra en España trabajando; su trabajo es sacrificado ya que sale a realizar sus actividades en la madrugada; la señora indica que el crédito que se le otorgo es de gran ayuda porque con este dinero aumentara capital de trabajo adquiriendo mercadería y realizando el mantenimiento de su vehículo para que pueda desarrollar su actividad en el transporte.
texts.en: Miriam sells children's and adults' fleece clothing. She has 5 years' experience doing this. Her sales stall is on one of the most busy streets in the city of   Cochabamba. She goes out to sell on market days, which are Wednesdays and Saturdays, the days they are able to go out and sell merchandise. On the days she doesn't sell, she works as a driver in her own vehicle for a taxi service. She lives in her parents' house and has three children. She takes care of her children's studies and support; her husband is working in Spain. Her work is hard since she has to go out at dawn. She indicates that the loan is a big help because this money will increase her working capital, acquiring merchandise and maintaining her vehicle so that she can develop her transportation activity.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta works hard to support her family. Violeta is married and has a vegetable selling business in the Philippines.

Violeta requested a PHP 29,500 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy vegetables to sell.

Violeta has been in this business for 22 years now.

In the future, Violeta would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is 44 years-old and married with two children.

Cristina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy additional items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Cristina has borrowed and repaid 21 loans from Kiva partner NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 21 years and also earns an income from ready to wear and farming rice.

Cristina aspires to build and expand her business in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 61 years-old and widowed with four children.

Erlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Kiva partner NWTF in order to purchase more items to sell, such as shampoo, groceries, etc., in her sari-sari store.

Erlinda has borrowed and repaid ten loans from Kiva partner NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 15 years and also earns an income from electronic reloading.

Erlinda aspires to build and expand her business in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Steffanie

texts.es: Steffanie tiene 21 años, es soltera, es muy joven y trabajadora, vive en casa de sus padres junto a sus hermanos y un sobrino. El trabajo de Steffanie consiste en la venta de ropa, vende sus productos en su barrio, lleva este trabajo ya casi dos años y lo hace sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es su independencia, pues mas adelante se decidirá por estudiar algo, pero para ello necesitará de capital. Considera que su trabajo es muy rentable, y por tanto desea estabilizarse por un buen tiempo. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más ropa de vestir para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Steffanie is 21 years old, single, very young and hardworking. She lives at home with her parents, siblings and a nephew. Steffanie sells clothes in the neighbourhood. She has been doing this for almost 2 years on her own. What she likes the most about her work is the independence it gives her. In the future she hopes to study but to do so requires money. She thinks that her work is very profitable and therefore wants to stay in this business for a while. This is her 3rd loan with MFP and she is hoping to get all your support in order to continue with this line of business. With the amount requested, she will buy more clothing to offer her clients.

loans.use: to buy more clothing.

loans.name: Jemima

texts.en: Jemima, a married 54-year-old with four children, one of whom is in school, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. The operator of a food-vending business in the Philippines for the past 15 years, she has requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy more ingredients for her business. In the future, Jemima would like to save money to expand her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 39 years old and married. She is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She has 5 grown children who have helped her manage her retail store, which she started 4 years ago. The store provides commonly used items for day-to-day living to ease the burden of going into town to buy these needs and spending more money for fare. Alma is able to generate a monthly income of PHP 8,000 from the business.

In 2008, Alma joined GDMPC to have access to financial services. All her previous loans have been successfully repaid. For her 7th time of borrowing from the cooperative, Alma is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase daily use commodities such as salt, spices, bath and laundry soap, rice, etc. to sell. Alma is expecting a good return of investment by having all of these items on hand. She plans to use any revenue from the business for business expansion and repairs to the house.

loans.use: To purchase daily use commodities to sell

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma tiene 42 años, es una mujer alegre, amable y carismática, convive con su pareja, y con él tiene cuatro hijos, quienes ya son mayores de edad. Ahora solo vive ella y su pareja en casa de su madre. El trabajo de Vilma consiste en la venta de ropa, esta actividad lo hace en su casa y lleva ya trabajando así por casi un año, a veces espera a los clientes en su casa pero hay otras veces que sale a buscarlos entre sus vecinos y amigos. Trabaja sola, pues se siente mejor estar así sin tener que rendir cuentas a nadie, además el horario de trabajo lo elige ella, así administra su tiempo para realizar otras cosas. Hoy cuenta con muy buena cartera de clientes y espera por el momento mantenerse como hasta ahora. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, esta contenta con el grupo que conforma, ya que siempre se interesan por los demás. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para su posterior venta entre amigos, vecinos y familiares.
texts.en: Vilma is 42 years old and she is a happy, kind and charismatic woman. She live with her partner, and with him she has four children. Her children are all grown and she only lives with her partner now in her mother's house. Vilma's work consists of selling clothing, an activity she carries out from her house and she has been in business for almost a year. Sometimes she waits for clients in her house but other times she sets out to find them among her neighbors and friends. She works independently and she is more comfortable this way because she doesn't have to answer to anyone. She can also choose her own schedule, managing her time to do other things. Today she has a good roster of clients and she hopes to maintain it for the time being. This is her fourth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is happy with her group because they always show interest in others. with the funds requested she will purchase merchandise to later sell among her friend, neighbors, and family.

loans.use: to purchase articles of clothing for resale.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: La señora  Celia es cliente  nueva D. la institución, será la primera secuencia D. su crédito, la  cliente  es viuda y vive en la zona el tejar La Sra. Celia se dedica a la confección D. prendas D. vestir, ella confecciona uniformes para médicos  tiene clientes en clínicas, hospitales, el crédito lo destinara en  la compra D.  telas por mayor ya que le hicieron un pedido granD. para confeccionar uniformes para la carrera D. medicina  D. una universidad, es una persona muy trabajadora, con ganas D. seguir adelante y  hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Celia is a client of the new institution and this will be her first loan cycle. She is a widow and she lives in the region of El Teja. Celia makes articles of clothing, especially medical uniforms for her clients in clinics and hospitals. The loan will be used to purchase fabrics in wholesale to respond to a large order that has been placed. She will produce medical uniforms for the medical school in a university. She is a very hardworking person who is eager to move forward and to make her business grow.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics in wholesale.

loans.name: Florita

texts.en: Florita is 64 years old and married, with 9 children. She is a farmer who tills land in the town of Surallah, South Cotabato. Florita’s husband is also a farmer and they both work hard to increase their yield. Florita has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. This loan will help Florita and her husband achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a married woman who lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is 38 years old and has 4 school-aged children. For the past 3 years, she has operated a specialized retail store providing daily use merchandise such as sugar, salt, vinegar, shampoo, laundry and bath soap and many other items. The business basically caters to day-to-day consumption. Marilou is able to generate a monthly income of PHP 5,000 from store operations alone, not to mention her other sources of income.

Earlier this year, Marilou joined GDMPC to have access to financial services. This loan application is her first cycle of transaction drawn from the cooperative. She has applied for a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to purchase grocery products to sell profitably. As she sells more stock, more cash flows in. Marilou plans to use the anticipated revenue from this investment for business expansion and to buy necessary store facilities to improve business and service quality.

loans.use: To purchase grocery products to sell profitably.

loans.name: Mary Cler

texts.en:
Mary Cler, 23 years old, is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and has 3 school-aged children to care for. She raises pigs to earn a living and it is her passion to do so. While not her only source of income, Mary Cler earns PHP 6,000 a month from raising pigs.

Earlier this year, Mary Cler joined GDMPC to have access to financial services. For her first loan, she is requesting PHP 5,000 to purchase feed for the piglets. A bigger portion of her monthly income comes from selling the grown animals. Feeding the animals properly provides a good return when sold. Mary Cler hopes to raise them all well and sell them at a very good price. When she receives adequate revenue, Mary Cler will buy more piglets to grow.

loans.use: To purchase feed for the piglets.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda, 51 years old, has earned a living through farming for 30 years. She plants different crops such as rice, corn and vegetables. She has also tried cooking and selling delicacies such as rice cakes to the people in her neighborhood and has put up a sari-sari (variety) store business to help augment her income.

Imelda is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies. She hopes to have a stable business to sustain her family, especially regarding her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Neda

texts.en:
Neda is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and established a retail store four years ago. The cash inflow from it satisfies their needs. The store offers highly demanded merchandise - grocery, school and office supplies. Neda normally receives PHP 7,000 a month. This includes other irregular sources of income.

Neda joined GDMPC earlier this year. It has been her long time plan to join the cooperative, which was currently realized, for an opportunity to access the quality services offered. On her first loan application, she is requesting PHP 5,000. With the loaned amount, she can now purchase grocery supplies to sell at a profit.

 Neda expects to earn more income and expand the scope of her business to improve her entrepreneurial capacity and current living situation as well.

loans.use: To purchase grocery supplies to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Luzviminda

texts.en:
Ma. Luzviminda is 43 years old and is a married woman with five children. The oldest child is 17 years old and the youngest is only 3 months old.

Ma. Luzviminda is a farmer. She helps her husband till their land located in Surallah, South Cotabato. Rice is the main crop that they grow to sell. Ma. Luzviminda does her best to help improve their business and provide for her family’s needs. She applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm inputs. She hopes to help uplift her family’s living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm inputs.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita, 46 years old and married, works hard to provide for her family. She has run a rice farm in the Philippines for 30 years and also earns an income from a sari-sari store.

Having received and repaid four previous loans from NWTF, Lolita is now requesting a PHP 13000 loan to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She aspires to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Vicenta Isabel

texts.es: señora Vicenta  es  cliente nuevo será su primera secuencia,  tiene  tres hijos, y su esposo se llama Rafael juntos trabajan  en la decoración de interiores  y re tapizados de muebles, les va muy bien en su actividad,  la cliente vive  en la zona achachicala,  el crédito lo invertirá en la compra  de  tela por  mayor y  cuero por rollos estos materiales  le servirán para su trabajo, la Sra. Vicenta esta muy contenta por trabajar junto a su esposo sin descuidar a su familia, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Vicenta is a new client and it will be her first loan cycle. She has three children and her husband's name is Rafael. They work together in providing interior decorating services and upholstery services and their business is doing very well. She lives in the region of Achachicala. She will invest her loan in the purchase of fabrics in wholesale and rolls of leather. These are materials that will help her in her work. Vicenta is very happy to be able to work together with her husband without having to neglect her family. She is a very hardworking person and she is thankful with the institution for their support.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics in wholesale and rolls of leather.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 49 years old and married with 2 children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marcelina is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Marcelina has been raising pigs for 4 years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa, who is in her mid-40s and single, has had a grocery store business for three years now. She works from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. She will use this loan to buy other products that she can sell in her store; that's why she needed to request a loan of P 10,000.

Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house and have her own family.

loans.use: to buy drinks, snack foods, spices and rice for her store.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 49 years old. She is a widow and has six grown children living with her in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Big businesses start small - that is what she always bears in mind. For six years, Emelia has owned and operated a sari-sari (variety) store in her place of residence to earn a living for survival and enhance hidden capabilities in managing a satisfactory business. The store exists till the present time. She gets PHP 6,000 a month from this activity.

Earlier this year, Emelia became a GDMPC member. She began her loan application with the cooperative at the amount of PHP 5,000. The money is borrowed withe the intention of purchasing a few sacks of pig feed to sell retail. She believes she will earn more from this because most residents grow pigs. The probable revenue will be used to gradually buy necessary store facilities such as refrigerators, stock shelf and more.

loans.use: To purchase a few sacks of pig feed to sell retail.

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is 51 years old and married with 7 children.
